dṛḍho me bhāv sthiro me bhava āhāryo me bhava apratihāryo me bhava sarvakarmasu ca me cittaśreyaḥ kuru ha ha ha ha hūṁ ||
athāsminn uccāritamātre sakalatraidhātukatribhuvanajanasaṁniveśasya vajrakrodhaterittirimudrā pāṇibhyām āviśya bandhato dṛḍhībhūteti ||

atha vajrapāṇir yāthāvat praveśayitvā, sarvamahāmaṇḍalaṁ yathānupūrvato darśayitvā, vajraratnābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, vajracihnāni ca karebhyo dattvā, vajranāmābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, sarvatathāgatasarvārthatāyāṁ sthāpayām āsa ||
tatas trailokyādhipatīnāṁ sarvadevīnāṁ vajraratnābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, svacihnāni vajrāṇy adhiṣthāya, vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, sarvatathāgatasattvārthatāyāṁ pratiṣṭhāpayām āsa ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas teṣāṁ sarvapraviṣṭānāṁ buddhajñānāni niṣpādya, sarvamudrābandhāni śikṣayitvā, vajrasamayāny anuprādād anena śapathahṛdayena ||
mā vo jīvitanāśāya bhaveta samayo hy ayam iti ||
ayaṁ vaḥ samayo hanyād yadi kaścid atikramet |
yas tu kruddho nirīkṣena stheyaṁ tasya puras tathā ||
vajrarākṣāṁ dṛḍhāṁ baddhvā vajrabandhaṁ tu pīḍayet |
yas tu kaścit paritrārthaṁ bandhet krodhasamanvitaḥ |
rakṣāyai yasya sattvasya sthātavyaṁ tasya pṛṣṭhataḥ ||
yas tu samāhitaḥ kruddhaḥ prayuñjyāt samayo hy ayam |
tasya yuṣmābhiḥ purataḥ stheyaṁ sattvāgrasiddhaya iti ||
parivartya lalāṭe tu sthāpya yas tu samāhvayet |
tasya stheyaṁ puraḥ śaśvad yadi jīvitum icchati ||
oṁ vajrapātāla bhañja bhañja huṁ phaṭ ||

div.ab: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir bhagavantam etad avocat|

lg.l: ahaṁ, bhagavan, sarvatathāgatair duṣṭdamaka ity abhiṣktaḥ |
tat sādhv ājñāpayaiṣāṁ sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalabandhānāṁ kathaṁ pratipadyāmi ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvaparitrāṇārtham idaṁ sarvamaṇḍalākarṣaṇahṛdayam abhāṣat ||
oṁ vajrasamayākarṣaya sarvamaṇḍalān vajradharasatyaṁ mātikrama huṁ phaṭ ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvamaṇḍalāni sarvataḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvasthitāni ||
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇis tān sarvamaṇḍalasaṁniveśān āhūyaivam āha |
vayaṁ, bhagavan, māṁsāhārā duṣṭasattvatayaujuohāreṇa jīvikāṁ kalpayāmaḥ, tad ājñāpayatu bhagavān katham asmābhir jīvitavyam iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṁ duṣṭavajrakrodham abhāṣat ||
oṁ duṣṭavajrakrodha hana daha paca vidhvaṁsaya vikira sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrāmaṇḍalān bhañja bhañja marda marda khāda khāda paramantrān vajrasamayahuṁ phaṭ ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalāny ekadhyībhūtvānekāni vidhvaṁsitāni vikīrṇāni |
te ca duṣṭasamayasattvā dahyamānāḥ pacyamānā mahānto mahārauravārtān ravān muñcanto, yena bhagavān mahāvajradharas, tenāñjalayo baddhvaivam āhuḥ |
paritrāyasva, bhagavan, yena vayaṁ prāṇān na parityajāmaḥ ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat |:
ājñāpayasva, bhagavan, kathaṁ eṣāṁ duṣṭamaṇḍalānāṁ pratipadyāmi ||
oṁ niśumbha hana daha paca gṛhṇa bandha huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṁ vajrakrūrakrodham abhāṣat ||
oṁ mahāvajrakrūrakrodha pātaya sarvaduṣṭamaṇḍalān, vināśaya sarvaduṣṭasamayān, vikira vidhvaṁsaya visphoṭaya
bhañjaya sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrābandhān, gṛhṇa hana daha paca sarvaduṣṭasamayasattvān, vajrasamaya huṁ phaṭ ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tāni sarvaduṣṭasamayamudrāmaṇḍalāni punar apy ekadhyībhūtvā mahāsāgare prapatitānīti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat |
tad eṣāṁ ḍākinīgrahādīnāṁ sarvagrahāṇāṁ kathaṁ pratipadyāmi ||
oṁ hana hana vajra huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvaḍākinyādiduṣṭagrahākarṣaṇahṛdayam abhāṣat |
oṁ vajrākarṣaya śīghraṁ sarvaduṣṭagrahān vajradharasatyena huṁ jaḥ ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahāḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyato maṇḍalībhūtvāvasthitā iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tān ḍākinyādīn sarvaduṣṭagrahān āhūyaivam āha |
pratipadyata, mārṣāḥ, prāṇātipātavairamaṇyaśikṣāsamayasaṁvare māvo vajreṇādīptena pradīptenaikajvālībhūtena kulāni nirdahyeham ||
atha te ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahā, yena bhagavān, te nāñjaliṁ baddhvā bhagavantaṁ vijñāpayām āsuḥ |
pratipadyasva, vajrapāṇa, eṣāṁ sattvānāṁ mahākaruṇām utpādyopāyaṁ dātum iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahākāruṇika idaṁ sarvasattvamaraṇanimittajñānamudrāhṛdayam abhāṣat ||
oṁ vajra pratigṛhṇa hṛdayam ākarṣaya yady ayaṁ sattvo māsād ardhena mriyate tad asya hṛdayaṁ niṣkramatu samaya hūṁ jjaḥ ||
vajrāṅgulimukhābhyāṁ tu svakakṣau tu samutkuṣed iti ||
anayā mudrayā bhavadbhiḥ sarvasattvahṛdayāny apakṛṣya bhoktavyānīti ||
atha te ḍākinyādayaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahā hulu hulu prakṣveḍitāni kṛtvā svabhavanaṁ gatā iti ||
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat |
ahaṁ bhagavadbhiḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvaduṣṭadamaka iti kṛtvādhīṣṭaḥ |
tad ājñāpayatu me bhagavān jvarādīnāṁ vyādhīnāṁ kiṁ karomi ||
oṁ vajrasamayānaya sarvaduṣṭajvarādīn nāśaya huṁ phaṭ ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre jvaradayaḥ sarve sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvathitā abhūvan ||
atha vajrapāṇis tān jvarādīn āhūyaivam āha |
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṁ svakarmaviśuddhijñānamudrāhṛdayam udajahāra |
oṁ vajrakarma viśodhaya sarvāvaraṇāni buddhasatyena samaya hūṁ ||
iyaṁ mudrā yasya jvarādisarvavyādhispṛṣṭasya karmato darśayet |
atha ta evam astv iti kṛtvā prakrāntā iti ||

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatān evam āha|

lg.l: tad ājñāpayantu me bhagavantaḥ eṣāṁ narakādīnāṁ sarvāpāyānāṁ kathaṁ pratipattavyam iti ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre rauravamahārauravādayaḥ sarvāpāyasaṁniveśāḥ sumerugirimūrdhni bāhyataḥ parivāryāvasthitāḥ ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tān apāyabhūmipratitān sarvasattvān āhūyaivam āha |
eṣa vayaṁ buddhaṁ dharmaṁ saṁghaṁ tvāṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gacchāma iti ||
eṣa vayaṁ buddhaṁ dharmaṁ saṅhaṁ tvāṁ ca śaraṇaṁ gacchāma iti ||
oṁ vajrapāṇi visphoṭaya sarvāpāyabandhanāni pramokṣaya sarvāpāyagatibhyaḥ sarvasattvān sarvatathāgatavajrasamaya traṭ ||
atha te tryāpāyagaticakrāntarasthitāḥ sarvasattvā vajrapāṇisakāśād imāṁ mudrāṁ dṛṣṭvā sarvadurgatibhyaś cyutgvā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūla upapannāḥ |
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api bhagavantam etad avocat: |
ahaṁ bhagavann aśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhānubhavanārthaṁ yāvat sarvatathāgatatvottamasiddhiphalāvāptihetoḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhivajraṁ dattvā, sarvatathāgatair adhīṣṭaḥ |
tat sādhv ājñāpayantu me bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā athaiṣāṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ kiṁ karomīti ||
atha sarvatathāgatā punaḥ samājam āgamyedam avocan |
oṁ vajrapāṇimahāmaṇḍalaṁ praveśaya sarvān duṣṭaraudrān nivāraya pāpebhyaḥ pramokṣaya durdṛṣṭiparyāpannān viśodhaya nāśaya vināśaya ha ha ha ha hūṁ ||

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatājñāvacanam upaśrutyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇasarvahitasukhottamasiddhinimittaṁ yāvat sarvatathāgatajñānābhijñāvāptiphalahetor

lg.l: idaṁ sarvatathāgatamahāvajrasamayabhūtaṁ trilokavijayaṁ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
sūtrayen maṇḍalaṁ tatra sūtraṁ raṅaiḥ prapūrayet ||
jvālāmadhye likhed ratnaṁ padmaṁ viśvāyudhaṁ tathā ||
evaṁ vajradhātvādiṣu sarvamaṇḍaleṣu sūtram ākramya sarvato gacched iti ||
manasotkṣipya rekhāṁ tu vajrasūtram athāpi vā |
praviśan niṣkraman vāpi trasyate samayān na sa iti ||
oṁ vajratuṣṭikrodha sādhu sādhu hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrabhṛkuṭikrodha hara hara huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrasūryamahājvālāmālakrodha jvālya sarvaṁ huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrāṭṭahāsakrodha haḥ haḥ haḥ haḥ huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradharmakrodha vināśaya viśodhaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajratīkṣṇakrodha cchinda cchinda huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrahetukrodha praviśa praveṣaya maṇḍalaṁ sarvān huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakrodhabhāṣa vada vada huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakavacakrodha rakṣa rakṣa huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrayakṣakrodha khāda khāda huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakrodhamuṣṭi sādhaya samaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajragīte gāda gāda hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrapāśakrodha praveśaya sarvasamayān huṁ hūṁ ||
oṁ vajrasphoṭamahākrodha bandha bandha sarvasamayān huṁ vaṁ ||
tatrādita eva tāvat samayaṁ vajrācārya eva vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṁ baddhvā praviśet ||
ahaṁ, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, krodhavaśaṁ yāsyāmi, nigrahītavyān nigrahīṣyāmi, saṁgrahītavyān saṁgrahīṣyāmi ||
tan me bhagavanta ājñāṁ dadatu kathaṁ pratipadyāmi
iti kṛtvā, vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṁ svahṛdayaṁ yathāvat sthāpya, vajrāṅkuśādibhiḥ karmāṇi kṛtvā, punaḥ sarvasamayamudrāṁ bandhayet ||
tato guhyapūjācatuṣṭayaṁ kṛtvā, tathā dhūpādibhiś ca |
svayaṁ vajrācāryo vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṁ baddhvā, praveśayed anena mantreṇa ||
oṁ vajra samayaṁ praviśāmi śiṣyāya bandhayed anena hṛdayena |

div.ab: tato nīlavastrottarīyanīloṣṇīṣāvabaddhaśirā nīlanaktakena mukhaṁ baddhvā, praveśayed anena mantreṇa|

lg.l: tataḥ praveśya vajrāveśasamayamudrayāsyāveśam utpādayed anena hṛdayena |
tato yathāvan mukhabandhaṁ muktā mahāmaṇḍalaṁ darśayet |
sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānāc ca vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ satatānubaddhaḥ svakīyāḥ siddhir dadāti ||
tato 'sya vajrābhiṣekeṇābhiṣicya, tīkṣṇasvavajracihnaṁ yathāvat pāṇibhyāṁ dātavyam anena mantreṇa |
oṁ vajrakrodha tvām abhiṣiñcāmi vajranāmābhiṣekatah, he vajranāma ||
tato yasya yan nāma kuryāt, tasya heśabdaḥ prayoktavya iti ||
vajraratnaṁ lalāṭe tu samālikhya tathaiva ca |
liṅgam ākramya tenaiva devān samākarṣed dhruvam ||
oṁ vajrakrodhāsanāgacchākarṣayāmi te vajrasamayam anusmara huṁ phaṭ ||
hṛdayaṁ sarvabuddhānāṁ sarvam apy ānayed dhurvam ||
manasā varmayet kāyam ātmanas tu parasya vā |
mahākavacayogena rakṣet sarvam idaṁ jagad iti ||
oṁ vajravidyottamamahākrodhānaya ho bhagavan vajra huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakrodhadṛṣṭi hana daha paca vināśaya huṁkāreṇa pātaya vajrasamaya huṁ phaṭ ||
saṁlapan mahatā vācā ṭakki huṁ phaṭ sakṛd vadet |
yasya yasya tu sattvasya so so maraṇam āpnuyāt ||
manasā mārayāmīti vajraṁ hṛdi tu bhāvayet |
huṁkāreṇaiva sarveṣāṁ mudrayaty abhitaḥ svayam iti ||
yasya sattvasya yenaiva manasā mudrayaty asau |
ābhir mudrābhir atyarthaṁ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayed iti ||
ekaikayā tu mudrayā caturṣu karmasu catvāri mudrāhṛdayāni prayuñjed iti ||
cummbaṁs tu daśanair oṣṭhaṁ gṛhya huṁkārayogataḥ |
huṁ kāraṁ yaḥ prayuñjīta sukhaṁ tv anubhavann asau |
huṁkāraṁ yaḥ prayuñjīta sarvāṅgena tu pīḍayan |
yas tu sattva hitārthāya sa tu buddhatvam āpnuyāt ||
maheśvaram umāṁ caiva bhūmau likhya tathaikramet |
rāgayet krodharāgā tu sādhukrodhā tu tuṣṭidā ||
dharmakrodhā hared dharmāṁś chided vai krodhavajrayā |
hetukrodhā hared duḥkhān vāg gharet krodhabhāṣayā ||
karmakrodhā sukarmāṇi kuryād rakṣāṁ tu rakṣayā |
dvyagrā saṁsthā bhṛkuṭyāṁ tu hṛdi sūryāgramaṇḍalā |
dharmamudrās tu tā eva huṁkāraiḥ sahitā punaḥ ||
yasya yasyāstu mudrā yā yad yat pārśvaṁ tu karmataḥ |
tatra tatra tu vai veṣṭya tāṁ tāṁ mudrāṁ prayojayet ||
vāmapādena taṁ sattvaṁ māsād ardhena sidhyati ||
yasya vai sattvakāyaṁ tu samāviṣṭas tu tāḍayet ||
vajramudrādvikaṁ baddhvā kavacas tvaṁ parasya vā |
granthanaṁ tarjanībhyāṁ tu rakṣā bhavati śāśvatī ||
bhaumānāṁ samayo hy eṣa sarvakṛd duratikramaḥ ||
ākarṣayan susaṁkruddho grahān sarvān vaśaṁ nayet ||
vajrāgryābhyāṁ svakakṣau tu kuśaṁs tu hṛdayaṁ haret ||
sūtraṁ tu dhārayet paścād yathāvatsūtraṁ smṛtam ||
krodhadṛṣṭyā tu saṁkruddhaḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayed iti ||

div.ab: krodhaguhyamudrāmaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api vajradhāraṇīsamayasaṁbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
oṁ sarvavajriṇi vajramāta ānaya sarvaṁ vajrasatyena huṁ jjaḥ ||

div.ab: athāsyāṁ bhāṣitamātrāyām vajrapāṇihṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇir vajrapāṇisadṛśasarvātmabhāvāḥ samantajvālāgarbhā vajrakrodhasamayamudrādevatā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatārthān

lg.l: niṣpādya, bhagavato vajrasattvasya guhyabhāryātāpracchādanārthaṁ kāyavākcittavajramudrābimbāni bhūtvā, bhagavato vairocanasya trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayinsuḥ ||
yat tathāgatasaukhyārthaṁ bhāryātvam api kurvata iti ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalaṁ vajrasamayaguhyaṁ nāmābhāṣāt ||
buddhasya krodhasamayān yathāvat tu likhed buddhaḥ ||
tatra madhye likhet tiryakśūle vajraṁ pratiṣṭhitam ||
vajraṁ vajrāṅkuśaṁ caiva vāṇaṁ tuṣṭiṁ tathaiva ca ||
vajraṁ bhṛkuṭimadhye tu vajraṁ sūrye tathā dhvajam |
dantapaṅkutiṁ tathā vajre tasya pārśveṣu saṁlikhet ||
jvālāmadhye likhet padmaṁ khaḍgaṁ cakraṁ tathaiva ca |
vajrajihvāṁ yathāvat tu tasya pārśveṣu sarvadā ||
triyagvajre likhed vajraṁ vṛtaṁ vajrair mahāprabhaiḥ ||
koṇeṣu bāhyasaṁstheṣu yathāvat tu likhen nayam |
oṁ vajraroṣe kāmavajriṇi vaśaṁ ma ānaya jhiḥ ||
oṁ vajrajvālāmālāprabhe mahākrodhāgni jvālaya sarvaṁ raviroṣe jiḥ ||
oṁ vajradhvajāgrakeyūramahākrodhe dehi me sarvārthaṁ jiḥ ||
oṁ vajrāṭṭahāsini hasa hasāṭṭāṭṭahāsena māraya jiḥ ||
oṁ vajraśuddhakrodhe hana māraya duṣṭān diḥ ||
oṁ tīkṣṇakrodhe vicchinda vajra^kośena sarvān diḥ ||
oṁ vajrahetumahākrodhe praviśa cakraṁ praveśaya sarvān diḥ ||
oṁ vajrajihve mahākrodhabhāṣe vacāṁ muñca diḥ ||
oṁ sarvamukhe karmavajriṇi mahākrodhe kuru sarvaṁ hniḥ ||
oṁ vajracaṇḍakrodhe mahāyakṣiṇi vajradaṁṣṭrākarālabhīṣaṇe bhīṣāpaya hniḥ ||
tatrādita eva tāvat trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍalapraveśavidhinā praviśya, vajraṁ gṛhya, vajrakulasamayamudrāpratimudropamudrājñānamudrābhiḥ vajradharapūjārthaṁ nṛtyopahāraḥ kartavya iti ||
tatrādita eva vajradhātusaṁgrahahṛdayaṁ vajragītena gāyan, sarvatathāgatānāṁ sotropahāraṁ kṛtvā, vajrācāryeṇa sattvavajrimudrā sphoṭayitavyā |
tatas tu nṛtyavidhivat tena krodhāṅkuśena tu |
muktvā mudrāṁ yathāvidhi tālayā caiva bandhayet ||
tuṣṭaḥ san sarvakāryāṇi sādhayed rucitaḥ kṣaṇāt ||
tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṁ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā |
tathaiva nṛtyan sūryaṁ tu parivartaṁ samāhvayet |
vaśitvāc ca sutejastvād dānād dhāsāc ca toṣayet ||
tathaiva nṛtyaṁś chinded vai vajrakośena nāyakān |
gāyan vai vajravācā tu pūjayed vajrapāṇinam |
kṛtvā caturvidhāṁ pūjāṁ mudrāṁ muñced yathā vidhīti ||
vajraṁ gṛhya tu pāṇibhyāṁ sphoṭayet kruddhamānasaḥ |
yasya nāmnā tu hṛdayaṁ sphuṭet tasya janasya hi ||
adhoṣṭhaṁ daśanair gṛhya yasya nāmnā tu pīḍayet |
śiras tasya sphuṭec chīghraṁ yady ājñāṁ samatikramet ||
nirīkṣan yasya nāmnā tu sphuṭete tasya cākṣiṇī ||
pīḍayed vajrabandhena tasya cītaṁ parisphuṭed iti ||
parivartya smitasthā tu samāgryā kuṭmalā tathā ||
hṛdisthā ed. hṛdi sthā valitā pārśve vāṇākarṣā tu vāmata.uh |
hṛdayāc ca samudvāntā bhṛkutiḥ parivartya vai ||
yathāsthāneṣu ed. yathā sthāneṣu saṁstheyā krodhadṛṣṭyā suroṣavān iti ||
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajrakulasamādhijñānamudrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imaṁ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetra bodhisattva imaṁ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imaṁ trilokavijayasūkṣmavajravidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api svakulam utpādya, vajradhātumahāmaṇdalayogena saṁniveśyaitāni svahṛdayāny abhāṣat ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajrabhṛkuṭikrodha hara hara hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajradhvajāgrakrodha sarvārthān me prayaccha śīghraṁ hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrasūkṣmakrodha ha ha ha ha hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajracchedakrodha cchinda bhinda hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajrakrodhamahācakra cchinda pātaya śiraḥ praviśya hṛdayaṁ bhinda hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajrahūṁkārakrodha hana pātaya vāṅmātreṇa hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajrakarmakrodha sarvakarmakaro bhava sarvakāryāṇi sādhaya hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrasūkṣmakavacakrodha rakṣa rakṣa hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajrayakṣakrodha hana bhakṣaya sarvaduṣṭān cintitamātreṇa vajradaṁṣṭra hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ sūkṣmavajramuṣṭikrodha bandha bandha hūṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṁ vajrakulasūkṣmajñānasamayamaṇḍalam udājahāra ||
tasya madhye likhed buddhaṁ jñānavajrasya madhyagam ||
buddhasya sarvapārśveṣu mudrās tā eva saṁlikhet |
adya tvaṁ sarvatathāgatavajrakrodhatāyāṁ vajrapāṇinā bhagavatā niṣicyase |

tat sādhu pratipadyasvāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuparitrāṇaṁ yāvat sarvatathāgatahitasukhottamasiddhyavāptiphalahetor vajrakrodhaḥ sarvasattvān api saṁśodhananimittaṁ mārayituṁ kaḥ punar vādaḥ sarvaduṣṭān iti ||
tataḥ sarvamaṇḍalaṁ darśayitvā, vajraṁ or tad vajraṁ yathāvat pāṇau dattvā,
huṁkāraṁ yojayed yasya tasya naśyati jīvitam ||
yāvantaṁ spharate taṁ tu tāvan naśyaty asau ripuḥ ||
spharayet krodhavān yāvat tāvat sarvān vināśayet ||
tathaiva saṁharet saṁ tu yāvad iccheta yogavān |
sarvaṁ vāpi hi niḥśeṣaṁ punar dadyāt tu jīvitam iti ||
vairaṁ tu yasya sattvasya sahabhūtvā mahādṛḍham |
adharmā yadi vā dharmā prakṛtyā tu prabhāsvarāḥ |
evaṁ tu bhāvayan sattvān hūṁkāreṇa tu nāśayet ||
durdurūṭā hi ye sattvā buddhabodhāv abhājanāḥ |
teṣāṁ tu śodhanārthāya hūṁkāreṇa tu nāśayet ||
vajrabimbaṁ samālikhya manasā yasya kasya cit |
pātayed gṛhamadhye tu tasya tan naśyate kulam ||
tad rājyaṁ vividhair doṣai rājñaiva saha naśyati ||
pātayed yatra rājye tu tad rājyaṁ naśyate dhruvam iti ||
bhāvayan svayam ātmānaṁ pated yatra patet sa tu ||
candre vajraṁ svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā |
pated yatra susaṁkruddhas tat kulaṁ patati kṣaṇāt ||
vajrapāṇiṁ svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā |
pated yatra hi taṁ deśam acirād vipraṇaṅkṣayate ||
buddhabimbaṁ svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā |
pated yatra tu tad rājyam acireṇaiva naśyatīti ||
yasya nāmnā sa mriyate saṁveṣṭan vajrahuṁkṛtaḥ ||
nirīkṣann andhatām yāti maraṇaṁ vā nigacchati ||
bhagena tu praviṣṭo vai manasā yasya kasya cit |
hṛdayākarṣaṇād yāti vaśaṁ svaṁ vā yam asya veti ||
oṁ vajrasūkṣmavajraśvāsa viṣaṁ pātaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradṛṣṭi viṣaṁ nāśaya huṁ phaṭ ||
huṁ hṛdayākarṣaṇakrodha praviśa kāyaṁ hṛdayaṁ chinda bhindākaḍḍhākaḍḍha phaṭ ||
vajrakrodhān svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayan sidhyati kṣaṇād iti ||
phaṭ śaṭ maṭ saṭ raṭ raṭ dhṛt haṭ paṭ traṭ kaṭ bhaṭ kṛṭ riṭ khaṭ vaṭ cieti |
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrakarmasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ svavidhyottamām abhāṣat ||
oṁ sarvatathāgatadharmadhātuspharaṇamahāpūjākarmavidhivistarasamaye trilokavijayaṁkari sarvaduṣṭān dāmaya vajriṇi hūṁ ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:

div.ab: atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api svakulapūjāvidhivistaradevatāḥ svahṛdayād utpādya, sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatākarṣaṇa, vaśīkaraṇānurāgaṇa, sarvakarmasiddhikāryakaraṇatāsaṁniyojanādīni

lg.l: sarvatathāgatarddhivikurvitāni kṛtvā, punar api bhagavato vairocanasya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāny āśrityāvasthitā iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṁ vajrakarmasamayavidhivistarakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
teṣāṁ sarveṣu pārśveṣu mahāsattvā niveśayed iti ||
oṁ vajrayakṣiṇi māraya vajradaṁṣṭrayā bhinda hṛdayam amukasya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakarmamuṣṭi sidhya sidhya huṁ phaṭ ||
athātra karmamaṇḍale yathāvad vidhivistaraṁ kṛtvā, vajrakulakarmajñānāny utpādayet ||
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālya tu hutāśanam |
taṇḍulāṁs tu juhvan nityaṁ gṛhapuṣṭir bhaved dhruvam ||
samidbhir madhuraiś cāpi vahniṁ prajvālya paṇḍitaḥ |
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālya tu hutāśanam |
kuśapravālāṁs teilena juhvan rakṣā tu śāśvatam iti ||
agniṁ prajvālya kuñjais tu kaṇṭakair eti karṣitaḥ ||
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ suroṣavān |
raktapuṣpān phalān vāpi juhvan rāgayate jagat ||
samidbhis tais tu saṁkruddho hy agniṁ prajvālya yogavān |
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ samāhitaḥ |
juhet tiktaphalaṁ krodhān mārim utpādayet kṣaṇāt ||
samidbhir amlaiḥ prajvālya kruddho hutabhujaṁ budhaḥ |
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ samāhitaḥ |
samidbhis tādṛśair eva prajvālya tu hutāśanam |
kāṇḍāny adṛśyapuṣpānāṁ juhvan rucyā na dṛśyate ||
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ samāhitaḥ |
vajripuṣpāñ juhet kruddho vajram ājñākaraṁ bhavet ||
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ suroṣavān |
yasya śaure juhen mālyaṁ so 'py ājñākaratāṁ vrajet ||
samidbhis tais tu saṁkruddhaḥ prajvālyāgniṁ samāhitaḥ |
vajrapāṇer juhen mālyaṁ so 'py ājñākaratāṁ jvajet ||
tair eva tu samidbhis tu prajvālyāgniṁ suroṣitaḥ |
cīvarāṇi juhed buddho yāty ājñākaratāṁ kṣaṇāt ||
priyayā tu striyā sārdhaṁ saṁvasaṁs tu bhage 'ñjanam |
prakṣipya ghaṭṭayet tatra tenāñjyākṣi vaśaṁ nayet ||
manaḥśilāṁ bhage viddhvā vajrabandhena tāṁ pidhet |
caturvidhair nimittais tu siddhiś cāpi caturvidhā ||
rocanāṁ tu bhage sthāpya guhyamuṣṭyā nipīḍayet ||
kuṅkumaṁ tu bhage viddhvā tad bhagaṁ satavvajrayā |
chāditaṁ jvalate tat tu bhaved vajradharopama iti ||
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajrasamayamudrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṁ svavajrasamayamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṁ svaratnasamayamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svadharmasamayamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svakarmasamayamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīdaṁ trilokavijayacaturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
trilokavijayādyās tu likhed buddhasya sarvata iti ||

div.ab: athātra caturmudrāmaṇḍale mahāmaṇḍalayogenākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṁ kṛtvā praveśya,

lg.l: uccārayan striyā sārdhaṁ saṁvasan siddhir āpyate ||
pravartayan striyaṁ kāntāṁ paricumbaṁs tu sidhyati ||

tato yathāvad vajrakrāntitriśūlamudrādyāḥ catasraḥ samayamudrāḥ savidhivistarāḥ śikṣayitvānena caturmudrāprayogeṇa vajravādyatūryatālān niryātya, vajrasattvasaṁgrahahṛdayagītiṁ gāyatā mudrāpratimudropamudrājñānamudrābhir nṛtyopahārāpūjā kāryeti ||
tathaiva nṛtyan vāmāṁ tu gṛhya dakṣiṇamuṣṭinā |
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmaṁ svavajrasamayakrodham abhāṣat ||
tasya madhye likhet samyag vajriṇaṁ candramaṇḍalam ||

div.ab: athātra guhyamaṇḍale sarvasiddhividhivistaraṁ kṛtvā,

lg.l: sādhayet tu bhage viddhvā sarvakarmasu sidhyati
yathā maṇḍala evaṁ paṭādiṣu likhitānāṁ sarvapratimāsv api sāmānyā siddhir iti ||
adhitiṣṭhata, bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatā mamedaṁ kulaṁ, yena sarvasattvā yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā sarvasiddhīḥ prāpnuyur iti ||
atha bhagavataḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyāsya trilokavijayakalpasyādhiṣṭhānāyedam ūcuḥ ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratyāna sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
atha bhagavantḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punar api samājam āpadya jānann eva vajrapāṇiṁ mahābodhisattvam evam āhuḥ |
pratiapdyasva, vatsa, sarvatathāgatājñākāritāyā imaṁ maheśvarakāyam ataḥ svapādatalād moktum iti ||
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇis tāṁs tathāgatān evam āha ||
ahaṁ bhagavadbhiḥ sarvaduṣṭadamakaḥ krodha ity abhiṣiktaḥ |
tan mayāyaṁ vyāpāditaḥ. tat katham asya mokṣyāmīti ||
atha sarvatathāgatā maheśvarasya sarvatrilokādhipateḥ śarīrasya jīvitasaṁjananahetor idaṁ mṛtavijñānākarṣaṇahṛdayaṁ svahṛdayebhyo niśceruḥ ||
athāsmin āptamātre bhagavān bhasmeśvaranirghoṣatathāgato bhasmacchannalokadhātor āgatvā maheśvarakāyaṁ praviṣṭvedam udānam udānayām āsa ||
yo mṛto 'pi hi kāyo 'yaṁ jīvadhūtatvam āgata iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṁ pādotkṣepaṇaṁ nāma hṛdayam udājahāra ||
parivartya tayor vajraṁ tam adhogāt samuddhared iti ||
harṣite parivartā tu or haste paribhraman vajre vajrādhonayam uddhared iti || or 'dho mūrdhe gāṁ samuddhared iti ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre mahāvajradharapādamūlān mahādevo muktaḥ svayam ajānāt || tato 'yaṁ maheśvarakāyo 'nena tatathāgatena pratijīvam or sañīvam adhitiṣṭhāya,
svayauva or yuvarājyatāyām atraiva lokadhātau sarvasattvārthaṁ sarvaduṣṭavinayārthaṁ ca pratiṣṭhāpitavān iti ||
atha tato vajrapāṇicaraṇatalād imāṁ cajdrapādāṁ nāma sarvatathāgatabodhicittamudrāṁ niścacāra ||
athāsyāṁ viniḥsṛtamātrāyāṁ tata eva pādatālāc candrottara eva tathāgato viniḥsṛtya maheśvaramūrdhavajrapāṇicaraṇākrānta pādena candrārdhikakrānto bhūtvā vāmapārśve saṁsthitaḥ ||
atha sarvatathāgatair vajrapāṇimitratve pāṇau or pāṇibhyāṁ) vajrajñānaṁ vadhvā (or vajraśūlaṁ dattvā vajravidyottamo vajravidyottama iti vajranāmābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ ||
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tena vajraśūlenālātacakraparivartanatayā nṛtyopahārapūjāṁ kurvann idam udānam udānayām āsa ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tato vajrakrodhasamādher vyutthāya bhagavantam etad avocad ||
ahaṁ, bhagavan, sarvatathāgatair vajraṁ pāṇibhyāṁ dattvā vajrapāṇitvenābhiṣiktaḥ||
tad eṣāṁ devādīnāṁ bāhyavajrakulānām asmin trilokavijayamahāmaṇḍale sthānaviniyogaṁ kariṣyāmi, yena te sattvā avaivartikā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhāv iti ||
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha idaṁ tathāgatoṣṇīṣam udājahāra ||

athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣebhyaḥ sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇir anekavarṇā raśmayo bhūtvā sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsya, punar api bhagavato vajrapāṇer cūḍāntare sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣayogataḥ saṁgamya pratiṣṭhitaḥ ||
atha tatas tejorāśita idaṁ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣaṁ niścacāra ||
oṁ namaḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīśatejorāśi anavalokitamūrdha hūṁ dhaka vidhaka dara vidara huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svavidyottamam udājahāra ||
tataḥ punar api vajrapāṇiḥ svahṛdayād idaṁ hṛdayam udājahāra ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
oṁ svabhāvaśuddhavajrapadma śodhaya sarvān vidyottama huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajravośvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
oṁ vajrakarmottama vajradhara samayam anusmara śumbha niśumbhākarṣaya praveśayāveśaya bandhaya samayaṁ grāhaya sarvakarmāṇi me kuru mahāsattva huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ bhagavato vajrapāṇeḥ pādavandanīyaṁ niryātayām āsa ||
oṁ śumbha niśumbha vajravidyottama huṁ phaṭ ||
atha krodhavajro vidyārājo bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatyedaṁ svahṛdayam adāt ||
atha māyāvajro vidyārāja idaṁ svahṛdayam abhāṣat ||
oṁ vajramāya vidarśaya sarvaṁ huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajragaṇṭa raṇa raṇa huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrakuṇḍalir vajrakrodho bhagavate vajrapāṇaya idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ pādavandanīyaṁ niryātayām āsa ||
oṁ vajrakuṇḍalimahāvajrakrodha gṛhṇa daha paca vidhvaṁsaya vajreṇa mūrdhānaṁ sphālaya bhinda hṛdayaṁ vajrakrodha huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajraprabho vajrakrodha idaṁ svahṛdayam adāt:||
oṁ vajraprabha māraya saumyakrodha hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradaṇḍa tāḍaya sarvaduṣṭān mahākrodha huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapiṅgalo vajrakrodha idaṁ svahṛdayam adāt ||
oṁ vajrapiṅgala bhīṣaya sarvaduṣṭān bhīmakrodha huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajraśauṇḍo gaṇapatir bhagavate vajrapāṇaya idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ niryātayati sma ||
oṁ vajraśauṇḍamahāgaṇapati rakṣa sarvaduṣṭebhyo vajradharājñāṁ pālaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajramālagaṇapate mālayākarṣaya praveśayāveśaya bandhaya vaśīkuru māraya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajravijaya vijayaṁ kuru mahāgaṇapati huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajramusalo vajradūta idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ vajrapāṇaye niryātayām āsa ||
oṁ vajramusalo kuṭṭa kuṭṭa sarvaduṣṭān vajradūta huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrānalamahādūta jvālaya sarvaṁ bhasmīkuru sarvaduṣṭān huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrabhairavavajradūta bhakṣaya sarvaduṣṭān mahāyakṣa huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrāṅkuśo vajraceṭa idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ bhagavate vajrapāṇaye niryātayām āsa ||
oṁ vajrāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvaṁ mahāceṭa huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakāla mahāmṛtyum utpādaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajravināyakāsya vighnaṁ kuru huṁ phaṭ||
atha nāgavajra idaṁ svahṛdayaṁ bhagavate vajrapāṇaye pādavandanīyaṁ niryātayām āsa ||
oṁ nāgavajrānaya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktālaṁkārādīni sarvopakaraṇāni vajradhara samayam anusmarākaḍḍha gṛhṇa bandha hara hara prāṇān mahāceṭa huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṁ sarvavajrakulākarṣanasamayam udājahāra ||
maṇḍalasya tu madhye vai viddhvā khadirakīlakam |
tatas tu sūtraṁ dviguṇaṁ kṛtvā tena prasūtrayet ||
oṁ vajrakīla kīlaya sarvavighnān bandha hūṁ phaṭ ||
bāhyatas tasya niṣkramya dviguṇaṁ tu tathaiva ca ||
tatas tu sūtraṇaṁ tat tu raṅgaiḥ śuddhais tu pūrayet |
vāmavajramahāmuṣṭyā prāg rekhāṁ tu tato yathāsukham ||
oṁ vajrodghāṭanasamaya praviṣa śīghraṁ smara vajrasamaya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ śumbha niśumbha huṁ gṛhṇa gṛhṇa huṁ gṛh.āpaya huṁ ānaya ho bhagavan vajra huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradṛṣṭikrodha dṛṣṭyā māraya huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajraviśvakrodha kuru sarvaṁ viśvarūpatayā sādhaya hūṁ phaṭ ||
vajravega iti khyātas tena rekhāṁ samākramed iti ||
vajradvāreṣu sarveṣu dvārapālās ta eva tu |
ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad vidhivistaram iti ||

div.ab: athātra trilokacakramahāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādikarma kṛtvā, svayaṁ vajrācāryo vajrakrodhaterittirimudrāṁ baddhvaivaṁ brūyād

lg.l: tat tvayā na kasya cid vaktavyam |
mā te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālakriyayā nakarapatanaṁ syād iti ||
ayaṁ vajrakrodhasamayas te saṁdahet kulam, mūrdhād ārabhya kāyaṁ tu nāśayed yady atikramet, samayaṁ bhandhaya ||
oṁ sarvatathāgatavajradhara gṛhṇa bandha samaya huṁ ||
mudreyaṁ karmasamayā ^vajrabandhāpi or bandheti kīrtitā or sarvakarmāgrakartṛtā ||, rather vajradhārīti or dhāry api kaīrtitā||
oṁ vajrābhiṣekābhiṣiñca vajradharatve samaya gra gra ||
tato naktakena mukhaṁ baddhvā praveśayet śiṣyān anena hṛdayena ||
oṁ praviśa vajra praveśaya vajrāviśa vajrādhitiṣṭha vajra hūṁ ||
tataḥ praveśya puṣpāṇi k.epayed anena hṛdayena ||
tato mukhabandhaṁ muktvā maṇḍalaṁ yathānupūrvato darśayet ||
na cāsya vaktavyaṁ kiṁ devā iti ||
santi sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayo ye na śraddhāsyanti kim etad amoghaṁ buddhānām bhagavatāṁ jñānaṁ yathā tathāgatā vajrakule vajrapāṇinābhiṣiktās tathāgatā eveti samayaḥ ||
anyatra ye devabhaktās teṣāṁ śathāhṛdayaṁ dattvā vācyam iti ||
tato vajraratnacihnamālābhiṣekaṁ dattvā, karmavajraṁ pāṇibhyām abhiprayacchya, vajranāma kuryāt |
hṛdy aṅguṣṭhamukhānāṁ tu bandhanād dhṛdayā smṛtā ||
tām eva mūrdhād ārabhya bhraman kāyāgramaṇḍalā |
ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi sādhanaṁ karma eva ca ||
yasya sattvasya yā mudrā bhavet tasya svam ātmanā |
bhāvayaṁs taṁ svam ātmānaṁ mudrāsādhanam uttamam ||
daṇḍākaṇṣṭhā tu nairvāṇī vajravajrā tu māraṇī ||
daṇḍāgrā ghātanī caiva bhīmākṣī tu bhayaṁkarī ||

div.ab: sarvavajrakulavajramaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatavajradhāraṇīsamayasaṁbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ sarvavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajravidyottamo bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajramāyo vidyārāja imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrakuṇḍalir vajrakrodha imāṁ samayamudrām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṁ sarvavajrakulavajramaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
caturasram ed. aśram uttaradvāraṁ sūtrayed bāhyamaṇḍalam ||
bhīmāṁ śriyaṁ sarasvatīṁ durgāṁ koṇeṣu vāmataḥ |
bāhyakoṇeṣu mudrā vā āsām eva tu saṁlikhet ||
ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi yathāvad vidhivistaram iti ||

div.ab: athātra vajramaṇḍale yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā vajrāṅkuśādibhiḥ samayakarma kṛtvā, vajradhārimudrāṁ yathāvad baddhvā brūyān:

lg.l: na kasya cit tvayādṛṣṭasamayasyaitāḥ samayamudrāḥ purato vaktavyāḥ |

div.ab: tatas tat karmavajraṁ vajradhārimudrāyā upari sthāpya yathāvat praveśayet||

lg.l: yatra patati sāsya samayamudrā vaśyā bhavati ||
tato mukhabandhaṁ muktvā maṇḍalaṁ yathāvad darśayitvā, samayamudrārahasyaṁ brūyāt ||
mātaraś ca bhaginyaś ca bhāryā duhitaro 'nugā iti ||
oṁ sarvavajragāmini sarvabhakṣe sādhaya guhyavajriṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
tataḥ sarvaśuddhicittatām avetya, sarvamudrā manasttamāny api sarvakarmāṇi kurvantīty āha bhagavān vajradharaḥ ||
mukhorṇā ca mukhodvāntā mūrdhni sthāpya dvidhīkṛteti ||
anayā baddhayā samyak sidhyed vidyottamaḥ svayam ||

div.ab: sarvavajrakuladharmasamayamaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmasamayasaṁbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemaṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīmaṁ svadharmasamayam abhāṣat ||
oṁ bhūr bhuvaḥ svar huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṁ sarvavajrakuladharmasamayamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||

div.ab: athātra dharmasamayamaṇḍale yathāvat karma kṛtvā, vajradhārimudrāṁ savajraghaṇṭāṁ baddhvā praveśyaivaṁ brūyāt|

lg.l: na tvayā kasya cid asamayadṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭadevakulasya vaktavyam iti ||
yathā raṇāpyate ghaṇṭā śabdaś cāsya yathā dhruvam |
tatredaṁ karmavajraṁ te nāśaṁ kuryāt tathā dhruvam ||
duṣṭamaitrī virāgaś ca yadi kuryād bhavān kadeti ||
tato mukhabandhaṁ muktvā maṇḍalaṁ darśya, dharmasamayamudrājñānaṁ śikṣayet ||
māyopamaṁ jagad idaṁ duḥkhaṁ ghaṇṭopamaṁ tathā |
nirvāṇaṁ sarvaduḥkhānāṁ vajraṁ bhediṣv anuttamam iti ||
daṇḍāt samo na nirghāto mithyādṛṣṭir bhayaṁkara iti ||
madāt tulyo na dhairyo 'sti mālātulyaṁ na bandhanam |
prahāro nigrahāgryo hi saparśānāṁ tu samīraṇāḥ |
tejasāṁ hutabhug jyeṣṭhaḥ bhojanānāṁ tu lohitam iti ||
daṁṣṭrāśuddhaḥ praviṣṭas tu mṛtyuḥ sarvapade sthitaḥ |
bhayāt tulyo na vighno 'sti jalāt tulyo na vai rasa iti ||

div.ab: sarvavajrakulakarmamaṇḍalavidhivistaraḥ

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatakarmasamayodbhavavajrādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar api svakarmottamām abhāṣat ||
oṁ vajravidyottame nṛtya nṛtya vikurva vikurva hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakrodhavajrāgni jvālaya triśūlaṁ bhinda hṛdayaṁ vajreṇa hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajraheme chinda cakreṇa vajriṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakaumārī śīghram āveśaya ghaṇṭāśabdena vajrapāṇipriye vajrasamayam anusmara raṇa raṇa hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajraśānti japa japākṣamālayā sarvān māraya śāntadṛṣṭyā hūṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajramuṣṭi hana hana vajreṇa bhinda bhinda pīḍaya pīḍaya sarvaduṣṭahṛdayāni, oṁ śumbha niśumbha hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrāmṛte sarvaduṣṭān gṛhṇa bandha hana paca vidhvaṁsaya vināśaya bhinda chinda bhasmīkuru mūrdhānaṁ tāḍaya vajreṇa ye kecid mam amukasya vighnavināyakās tān dāmaya dīptakrodhavajriṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakāṇṭi māraya saumye rūpe pradīptarāgeṇa śīghraṁ sphoṭaya hṛdayaṁ vajradharasatyena mahājyotsnākarāle śītaraśmivajriṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradaṇḍāgre ghātaya huṁ or hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajramekhale khana khana śabdena vaśīkuru māraya bhīṣaṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajravilaye chinda sina bhinda vajreṇa mādayonmādaya piba piba hūṁ ed. hūm phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrāśane bhakṣa duṣṭān vajradarśane śantidhāriṇi mānuṣamāṁsāhāre nararudhirasavapriye majja
vāsānulepenaviliptagātra ānaya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇādīni saṁgrahamayavarade bhakṣiṇi hūṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajravasana ānaya sarvavastrānnapānādyupakāraṇāṇi śīghraṁ vaśīkurv idaṁ me prayacchāviśāviśa satyaṁ kathaya vajrakośadhāriṇi huṁ or hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajravaśy ānaya vaśīkuru sarvastriyaḥ sarvapuruṣān dāsīkuru kruddhān prasādaya vyavahārebhyo vyutāraya vijayaṁkari vajrapatākādhāriṇi huṁ or hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajradūty ānaya sarvān maṇḍalaṁ praveśaya bandhaya sarvakarmāṇi me kuru śīghraṁ laghu laghu trāsaya māraya māraya rāveṇa vajrakhaṭvāṅgadhāriṇi huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vegavajriṇi ghu ghu ghu ghu śabdena māraya vikira vidhvaṁsaya vajrapaṭadhāriṇi huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrajvāle jvālaya sarvaṁ vajrajvālayā daha daha bhasmīkuru huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajravikaṭe pravikaṭadaṁṣṭrākarālabhīṣanavaktre śīghraṁ gṛhṇāveśaya bhakṣaya rudhiraṁ piba mahāyakṣiṇi vajrapāśadhāriṇi huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajramukhy ānaya vajradaṁṣṭre bhayānike pātālanivāsini khana khana khāhi khāhi sarvaṁ mukhe praveśaya sphoṭaya marmāṇi sarvaduṣṭānāṁ vajraniśitāsidhāriṇi huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrakāli mahāpretarūpiṇi mānuṣamāṁsarudhirapriya ehy ehi gṛhṇa gṛhṇa bhakṣaya vajraḍākini vajraśaṅkale sarvadevagaṇamātṛbhūte hara hara prāṇān amukasya
kapālamālālaṁkṛtasarvakāye kiṁ cirāsi vajrakhaṭvāṅgadhāriṇīpretamānuṣaśarīre śīghram āveśaya praveśaya bandhaya māraya vajrarākṣasi huṁ huṁ huṁ huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajrapūtane mānuṣamāṁsavāsarudhiramūtrapurīṣaśleśmasiṁghāṇakaretogarbhāhāriṇy āyāhi śīghram idam asya kuru vajraśodhanikādhāriṇi sarvakarmāṇi me kuru huṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ vajramakare grasa grasa śīghraṁ śīghraṁ praveśaya pātālaṁ bhakṣaya vajramarakadhāriṇi huṁ phaṭ ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ punar apīdaṁ sarvavajrakulakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
teṣāṁ pārśveṣu paṅktyā vai mahāsattvān niveśayet ||
koṇeṣu dvārabhāgeṣu hy anupūrvaṁ dhūpādikam iti ||
athātra karmamaṇḍale samākarṣaṇādikarma kṛtvā yathāvad vajradhārikarmasamayamudrāṁ baddhvaivaṁ vadet |
na tvayā kasya cid adṛṣṭadevatākramavijñātakarmasyedaṁ guhyakarma vaktavyam |
oṁ vajradhāry āveśaya praveśaya nṛtyāpaya sarvakarmasiddhiṁ me prayaccha hūṁ aḥ hūṁ a la la la la vajri ||
tataḥ prabhṛti sarvakarmāṇi kāyavāgdṛṣṭimanovajra^mudrābhir or mudrādibhir īpsitena karoti ||
mahāvajradharādīṁś ca karmasiddhir bhaved dhruvam iti ||
atha vajrapāṇiḥ sarvavajrakulān sarvasattvārthatāyāṁ yāvat saṁniyojyāvaivartikabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpya jānann eva bhagavantam etad avocat ||
tad ajñāpayasva kiṁ tat tathāgataguhyam iti ||
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgataguhyavajraṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ sarvatathāgataguhyam abhāṣat ||
yathā yathā hi vineyāḥ sarvasattvāḥ svajātataḥ |
tathā tathā hi sattvārthaṁ kuryād rāgādibhiḥ śuciḥ ||
mārayet sarvasattvāṁs tu na sa pāpena lipyate ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva idaṁ svamaṇiguhyam abhāṣat ||
haraṁs tu sarvavittāni na sa pāpena lipyate ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattva idaṁ sarvadharmaguhyam abhāṣat ||
rāgatulyasukhaṁ nāsti jinebhyas taṁ tu saṁdadan |
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva idaṁ svakarmaguhyam abhāṣat ||
sarvakarmāṇi kuryāt vai sa bahupuṇyam āpnuta iti ||
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgato bhagavate guhyadhāriṇe vajradharāya sādhukārair abhiṣṭavat ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe |

div.ab: sarvatathāgatadharmasamayo nāma mahākalparājaḥ

lg.l: atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, tam eva vajrapāṇiṁ bhagavantaṁ sarvadharmeśvaram avalokiteśvaram anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ ||
sanso śaṁkara śudhārtha buddhapadma namo 'stu te ||
yainaṁ sarvātmanā gauṇaṁ nāmnām aṣṭaśataṁ tava |
svakaṁ tu kulam utpādya dharma-maṇḍalam uttamam iti ||

atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvatathāgatādhyeṣaṇavacanam upaśrutya, yena bhagavāñ chākyamunis tathāgataḥ, tenābhimukhaṁ sthitvā, tad vajrapadmaṁ svahṛdi pratiṣṭhāpyedam udānam udānayām āsa ||
aho hi paramaṁ śuddhaṁ vajrapadmam idaṁ mama |
pitāham asya ca suto 'dhiṣṭhasva kulaṁ tv idam iti ||
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatavajradharmasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhānpadmaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ sarvatathāgatadharmasamayaṁ nāma sarvatathāgatahṛdayaṁ svahṛdayān niścacāra ||

div.ab: athāsmin viniḥsṛtamātre sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyaḥ padmākārāḥ anekavarṇarūpaliṅeryāpatharaśmayo viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu rāgādīni saṁbuddhadharmatājñānāni saṁśodhya, punar apy āgatyāryāvalokiteśvarasya hṛdaye praviṣṭā iti ||
atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatadharmasamayaṁ nāma vidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva idaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvarūpasaṁdarśanaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ sarvajagadvinayasamayaṁ nāma svahṛdayam abhāṣat ||

div.ab: athāsmin bhāṣitamātre āryāvalokiteśvarahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajradharaḥ āryāvalokiteśvararūpadhāriṇaḥ padmapratiṣṭhāḥ padmamudrācihnadhārivicitravarṇarūpaveśālaṁkārāḥ tathāgatādisarvasattvamūrtidharā mahābodhisattvavigrahā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṁ yathāvaineyatayā svarūpāṇi saṁdarśyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvadhātuvinayaṁ kṛtvā, punar apy āgatya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena bhagavataḥ śākyamunes tathāgatasya sarvataś candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayinsuḥ ||
yatra hy upāyavināyād devā api bhavanti hi ||

atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakulam utpādya, sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvasattvābhayārthaprāptyuttamasiddhivajradharmatājñānābhijñāvāptiphalahetor niryātya, sarvajagadvinayaṁ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
vajraṁ ratnāṁ tathā padmaṁ viśvapadmaṁ tathaiva ca ||
oṁ padmamaṇiketudhara candraprahlādayāvalokiteśvara dehi me sattvārthān śīghraṁ samaya hūṁ ||
oṁ padmāṭṭahāsaikādaśamukha haḥ haḥ haḥ hūṁ ||
oṁ padmakumāra padmaśaktidhara khaḍgena cchinda cchinda hūṁ phaṭ ||

oṁ padmalīlakaṇṭhāśaṁkhacakragadāpadmapāṇi vyāghracarmanivasana kṛṣṇasarpakṛtayajñopvītājinacarmavāmaskandhottarīya nārāyaṇarūpadhara trinetra muñcāṭṭahāsaṁ praveśaya samayān dehi me siddhim avalokiteśvara hūṁ ||
oṁ brahmapadmasaṁbhava japa japa padmabhāṣa hūṁ ||
oṁ padmanarteśvara naṭa naṭa pūjaya sarvatathāgatān vajrakarmasamayākarṣaya praveśaya bandhayāveśaya sarvakarmasiddhiṁ me prayacchāvalokiteśvara hūṁ ||
oṁ abhayaṁdadāvalokite.vara rakṣa bandha padmakavacaṁ samaya haṁ ||
oṁ mahāpracaṇḍaviśvarūpavikaṭapadmadaṁṣṭrākarālabhīṣaṇavaktra trāsaya sarvān padmayakṣa khāda khāda dhik dhik dhik ||
oṁ padmamuṣṭisamayas tvaṁ bandha hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ padmalāsye rāgaya mahādevi rāgapūjāsamaye hūṁ ||
oṁ padmadhūpapūjāsamaye prahlādaya padmakuladayite mahāgaṇi padmarati hūṁ ||
oṁ padmapuṣpapūjāsamaye padmavāsini mahāśriye padmakulapratīhāri sarvārthān sādhaya hūṁ ||
oṁ dīpapūjāsamaye padmakulasundari mahādūty ālokaṁ saṁjanaya padmasarasvati hūṁ ||
oṁ gandhapūjāsamaye mahāpadmakulaceṭi kuru sarvakarmāṇi me padmasiddhi hūṁ ||
samālekhyā yathāvat tu teeṣāṁ ca hṛdayārthata iti ||
oṁ hayagrīvamahāpadmāṅkuśākarṣaya śīghraṁ sarvapadmakulasamayān padmāṅkuśadhara hūṁ jjaḥ ||
oṁ amoghapadmapāśakrodhākarṣaya praveśaya mahāpaśupatiyamavaruṇakuberabrahmaveśadhara padmakulasamayān huṁ huṁ ||
oṁ padmasphoṭa bandha sarvapadmakulasamayān śīghraṁ hūṁ vaṁ ||
oṁ ṣaṁmukhasanatkumāraveśadhara padmaghaṇṭayāveśaya sarvapadmakulasamayān sarvamudrāṁ bandhaya sarvasiddhayo me prayaccha padmāveśa aḥ aḥ aḥ aḥ ||
tatrādita eva padmācāryo vajrapadmasamayamudrāṁ baddhvā, yathāvat praviśya, vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena karma kuryād ebhir hṛdayaiḥ ||
tatas tathaivājñāṁ mārgya, tathaiva samayamudrayā svayam abhiṣicya, padmavigrahaṁ gṛhya, svapadmanāmoccārya, padmāṅkuśādibhiś ca karma kṛtvā, tatas tābhir eva dharmamudrābhir mahāsattvān sādhayet ||
nirbhidya tat kṣaṇam yāyād yadi brūyād imaṁ nayam ||
na kasya cit tvayedaṁ guhyavidhivistaram ākhyeyam |
viṣamāparihāreṇa ca kālakriyāṁ kṛtvā narakapatanaṁ syād iti ||
tataḥ śvetavastrottarīyaḥ śvetanaktakena mukhaṁ baddhvā praveśayed anena hṛdayena ||
tato yathāvat karma kṛtvā, padmavigrahaṁ pāṇau dātavyam ||
yathā raktam idaṁ padmaṁ gotradoṣair na lipyate |
bhāvayet sarvaśuddhiṁ tu tathā pāpair na lipyate ||
padmaṁ tu hṛdaye likhya padmabhāvanayā hṛdi |
buddhabimbaṁ lalāṭe tu likhyābhīkṣṇaṁ tu bhāvayet |
buddhabimbaṁ mukhe viddhvā jihvāyāṁ tu prabhāvayet |
bhāvayan padmam uṣṇīṣe khegāmī sa vaśaṁ nayed iti ||
kuḍye vāpy atha vākāśe bhāvayan padmam uttamam |
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā bhāvayan padmam uttamam |
yadā paśyet tadā gṛhṇa kāmyād adreśyatāṁ vrajet ||
kuḍye vāpy atha vākāśe viśvapadmaṁ samādhayet |
paśyan gṛhṇa pradānaṁ viśvarūpī tadā bhavet ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā vajrapadmaṁ tu bhāvayet |
taṁ tu gṛhṇan kṣaṇāc caiva padmavidyādharo bhavet ||
oṁ samādhiviśvapadma tiṣṭha viśvarūpyaṁ darśa bhagavan dhaḥ ||
lokeśvaraṁ lokeṣvaraṁ, ed samālikhya maṇḍalādiṣu tasya vai |
svam ātmānaṁ tataḥ siddho bahurūpī bhavet kṣanāt ||
bhāvayan padmapadmaṁ tu svam ātmānaṁ tathātmanā |
padmapadmā samādhiṁ tu dadyād viśvā suvaiśvatām ||
kāmeśvarī surāgitvaṁ dadyāt tuṣṭiṁ tu sādhutā |
tarayā cottarā siddhiḥ saubhāgyaṁ padma khaḍgayā ||
lāsyā ratiṁ dhanaṁ mālā svaraṁ gītā sukhaṁ nṛtyā ||
dhūpā hlādaṁ sukhaṁ puṣpā dīpā dṛṣṭiṁ gandhā sugandhatām |
vajrāñjaliṁ tu saṁdhāya lintu vajrakarmakarī bhavet |
parivartya tu padmena hṛdi sthāpya dṛḍhaṁ karī ||
padmamuṣṭiṁ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayed iti ||
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmadhāraṇīsamayasaṁbhavamudrādhiṣṭhānapadmaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imāṁ svakulasaṁbhavāṁ vidyottamām abhāṣāt ||
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahā sattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajraviśo bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva idaṁ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
tasya madhye supadme vai vajradhātvīśvarīṁ likhet ||
tatra madhye likhet padmaṁ padmais tu parivāritam ||
oṁ bhṛkuṭi taṭi vai taṭi padme hūṁ ||
oṁ padmahāsiny ekādaśavaktre diri diri iṭṭe vaṭṭe cale pracale kusumadhare ili praviśa siddhiṁ me prayaccha hūṁ ||
tatra madhye supadme tu padmamudrāṁ niveśayet ||
oṁ padmacakraśaṁkhagadādhāriṇi nīlakaṇṭhe sidhya sidhya hūṁ ||
oṁ paṇḍaravāsini padmasaṁbhave vada vada hūṁ ||
oṁ padmanatreśvari pūjaya sarvātathāgatān naṭa naṭa hūṁ ||
oṁ abhyaye padmakavacabandhe rakṣa māṁ hūṁ haṁ ||
oṁ mahāpracaṇḍi padmayakṣiṇi viśvarūpadhāriṇi bhīṣāpaya sarvaduṣṭān khāda khāda hūṁ phaṭ ||
oṁ padmāṅkuśy ākarṣaya mahāpadmakulān hayagrīvasamaye hūṁ jaḥ ||
oṁ amoghapāśakrodhasamaye praviśa prav.eśaya sarvasamayāṁ hūṁ ||
oṁ padmaghaṇṭādhāri śīghram āveśaya samayāṁ ṣaṇmukhi aḥ ||
atha mudrāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṁ kṛtvā, padmaśiṣyān yathāvat praveśayet ||
na tvayā kasya cid vaktavyaṁ yad atra guhyam |
mā te narakapatanaṁ bhaved du.khāni cātra janmanīti ||
tad yathā vadati tathā siddhir iti |
tad yadi śvetālokaṁ paśyet tasyottamasiddhijñānaṁ śikṣayet |
evaṁ vajradhātvādiṣv api sarvamaṇḍaleṣu yathābhājanatayā mudrājñānāni śikṣayed, iyaṁ parīkṣā ||
bhāvayaṁs tu mahāmudrām agryāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt ||
bhāvayaṁs tu svam ātmānam agryāṁ siddhim avāpnute ||
sādhaya vidhivac chīghram agryāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt || iti ||
hiraṇyaṁ tu mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā |
bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ ||
muktāphalaṁ mukhe viddhvā bhāvayet svayam ātmanā |
lokeśvaraṁ svam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ ||
bhāvayan svayam ātmānam eko bhūyāt sahasraśaḥ || iti ||
padmaṁ gṛhya puraḥ sthāti yasya so 'syānurajyati ||
bhāvayet svayam ātmānaṁ padmaṁ gṛhya yathā tathā |
nirīkṣed vajradṛṣṭyā vai sarvalokaṁ sa rāgayet ||
karābhyāṁ bhrāmayaṁs taṁ tu rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ || iti ||
chinded yasya puraḥ padmaṁ tasya mṛtyuḥ kṣaṇād bhavet ||
padmaṁ gṛhya dṛḍhaṁ samyak samayāgryā tayaiva hi |
sphoṭayet taṁ tu sudṛḍhaṁ yasya nāmnā sa naśyati ||
samādhimudrāṁ saṁdhyāya padmaṁ gṛhya yathā tathā |
yasya nāmnā tu padmaṁ vai chindet sa tu vinaśyati ||
sphoṭayed yasya saṁkruddhaḥ sphuṭet tasya tu jīvitam || iti ||
oṁ mahāpadmacheda chedaya, Ch māraya hoḥ phaṭ ||
oṁ mahāpadmasphoṭa nāśaya sphoṭaya nāśaya, Ch raṭ phaṭ ||
oṁ dharmapadmacheda chedaya, Ch vināśaya dhṛt phaṭ ||
oṁ karmapadmasphoṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya, Ch jīvitam asya kṛt phaṭ ||
padmaṁ tu yoṣitāṁ cintya vajraṁ tasyopari svayam |
padmaṁ tu yoṣitāṁ cintya buddhaṁ tasyopari svayam |
padmaṁ tu yoṣitāṁ cintya padmaṁ tasyopari svayam |
padmaṁ tu yoṣitāṁ cintya viśvaṁ tasyopari svayam |
rāmayan viśvapadmāgrīṁ viśvāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt || iti ||
dvyagrā maṇis tathā padmaṁ vajrabandhaṁ tathaiva ca ||
sā evāṅguṣṭhamuktā tu tarjanyā tarjanī grahā |
valitā suratiḥ proktā sādhukāryā tathaiva ca ||
kṛtvā tu mukhatodvāntaṁ kṛtvā mukhata udvāntaṁ?
utthitāṁ tarjanīṁ vāmāṁ karṣayet sudṛḍhaṁ tathā ||
sā eva hṛdi sūryā tu mūrdhni padmadhvajīkṛtā |
parivartya ca hāsā tu sthitā padmāṭṭahāsinī ||
kaniṣṭhāṅguṣṭhasaṁdhī tu tārāyāḥ samayo hy ayam ||
talacakrā tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiveha japadātrī tathaiva ca ||
vajrabandhaṁ tale kṛtvā bandhas tādṛśa eva hi || iti ||
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmajñānasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhānapadaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ imaṁ svakuladharmasaṁbhavaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svadharmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
saṁsiddho bhavate śīghram ākāśena sa gacchati ||
saṁsiddho bhavate śīghram ūrdhvam utpatati kṣaṇāt ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṁ tu bhāvayet |
anena vidhinā siddho adṛśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṁ tu bhāvayet |
tatrārūḍhaḥ svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayann adṛśyo bhavet ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṁ tu bhāvayet |
yadā paśyet tadā gṛhṇec chīgram adṛśyo bhavati ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā padmabimbaṁ tu bhāvayet |
dṛṣṭvā tu bhuktvā tat padmam adreśyo bhavati kṣaṇāt || iti ||
tatrārūḍhas tu khegāmī kāmarūpī bhaved dhruvam || iti ||
tayā gṛhya tu vai padmaṁ dadyād vaśyakaro bhavet ||
jñānapadmaṁ daded yasya so 'sya śīghraṁ vaśībhavet ||
yasya dadyāt samupaśaḥ sa nū vaśyaḥ?
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatadharmakarmasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhānapadmaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattva imāṁ svakulakarmasaṁbhavāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
athāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
buddhasya sarvataḥ sarvāḥ padmacihnadharā likhet || iti ||
athātra karmamaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṁ kṛtvā yathāvat praveśyaivaṁ vadet ||:
na tvayā, kulaputra, kasyacid ayaṁ vaktavyaḥ |
pāpāni deśayañ chīghraṁ savapāpān sa śodhayet ||
śudhya śudhya iti prodya sarvakarmāni śodhayet ||
budhya budhya pravartaṁs tu sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet ||
dhī dhī dhīti procyan vai sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet ||
hī hī hī hīti saṁdhāya sarvakarmāṇi śodhayet || iti ||
oṁ oṁ oṁ oṁ iti brūyāt sarvapūjāṁ pravartanam ||
bhū bhū bhū bhūr iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet ||
he he he heti saṁdhāya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet ||
dhe dhe dhe dha iti procya sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet || iti ||
hrī hrī hrī hrīti varteta siddhir lokeśvarī bhavet ||
śrī śrī śrī śrīti saṁdhāya prāpnuyāt siddhim uttamām ||
dhig dhig dhig dhig iti prokte padmakrodhas tu sidhyati ||
siḥ siḥ siḥ sīti saṁdhāya padmasiddhim avāpnute || iti ||
aho sukha iti prokte sarvabuddhān sa pūjayet ||
priye priyeti vai prokte buddhānāṁ bhavati priyaḥ ||
aho rateti vai prokte ratir bhavet sa śāśvatī ||
sukha sukha iti prokte sukhaṁ tasya na hīyate ||
karmasamayāṁ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayet || iti ||
atha bhagavān punar api vajradharmasamayamudrādhisṭḥānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ svamudrāhṛdayaṁ niścacāra ||:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattva idaṁ svamudrāhṛdayam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
athāryāvalokteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ caturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
athātra mahāmaṇḍala ākarṣaṇādividhivistaraṁ kṛtvā, yathāvat praveśya brūyāt |:
na tvayedaṁ kasya cid vaktavyaṁ mā te mahāduḥkha.ṁ bhaved akālamaraṇaṁ viṣamakriyayā
padmaṁ hastena vai gṛhya samājighran prayatnataḥ |
tena gandhena saṁyojya buddhān āśu prasidhyati ||
upaviśya yathātmānaṁ manasā sa tu mārayet ||
caturmukhaṁ tu vai padmaṁ kārayitvā kareṇa tu |
oṁ padmamukuṭatathāgata vaśīkuru sarvān lokeśvarābhiṣekasamaya hoḥ ||
oṁ padmapadma māraya sarvapratyarthikān, samādhijñāna dhik ||
oṁ viśvapadma sarvakarmakaro bhava lalilvali lali hūṁ phaṭ ||
raktaḥ san sarvakāryāṇi sādhayet samayo hy ayam |
duḥsādhyā 'pi hi mudrā vai kṣaṇāt sidhyati yogata iti ||
athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṁ sarvajagadvinayaṁ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat ||:
athāryāvalokiteśvaro mahābodhisattva idaṁ sarvajagadvinayaṁ nāma maṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
bhāvayaṁs tu mahāmudrāṁ bhaved viśvadharopamaḥ || iti ||
mudrāyām apy ekamudrāmaṇḍalayogena tathaiva siddhaya iti ||
atha sarvatathāgatā punaḥ samājam āgamyāvalokiteśvarāya mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adadan ||:
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
atha khalu sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya,
sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnaṁ tam eva vajradharam āryākāśagarbhaṁ mahābodhisattvam anena nāmāṣṭaśatenādhyeṣitavantaḥ ||:
śuddha sarvārtha śuddhārtha dānacarya namo 'stu te ||
dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgārya dāyaka |
yaḥ kaścid dhārayen nāmnām idaṁ te 'ṣṭaśataṁ śivam |
sarvabuddhābhiṣekaṁ tu sa prāpnoty anaghaḥ kṣaṇāt ||
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgata idaṁ sarvatathāgatamaṇisamayaṁ nāma vidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṁ svakulasaṁbhavaṁ vidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imaṁ svakulasaṁbhavaṁ vidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||
athāryākāśagarbho bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratnaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpannaḥ ||
samanantarasamāpanne cātha tāvad eva sarvatathāgatahṛdayebhyo vajramaṇiratnaraśmayo niścaritāḥ ||
te sarvalokadhātavo 'vabhāsya, sarvasattvān sarvatathāgatābhiṣekair abhiṣicya, punar apy ekadhyībhūtvā, bhagavata ākāśagarbhasya mahābodhisattvasya hṛdaye 'nupraviṣṭā iti ||

div.ab: atha tata ākāśagarbhahṛdayāt sa eva bhagavān vajrapāṇi samantaraśmijvālāgarbhā vicitravajramaṇiratnābhiṣekādyābharaṇālamkārālaṁkṛtakāyā mahāvajramaṇiratnacihnamudrāvyagrakarā mahābodhisattvakāyā bhūtvā viniḥsṛtya,

lg.l: sarvalokadhātuṣu mahāratnavarṣādibhī ratnotpattibhiḥ saṁtoṣya punar āgatya, bhagavato vairocanasya sarvato vajradhātumahāmaṇḍalayogena candramaṇḍalāśritā bhūtvedam udānam udānayiṁsuḥ ||
vajraratnakulaṁ tv edaṁ saṁbhūtaṁ jagadarthataḥ || iti ||
sarvatathāgatebhyaḥ sarvāśāparipūryai niryātyedaṁ sarvārthasiddhiṁ nāma mahāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
oṁ vajramaṇicihnākāśagarbha bhagavan sidhya sidhya hūṁ ||
oṁ ratnāṅkuśākarṣaya sarvārthān ānaya śīghraṁ sarvatathāgatasatyam anusmara hūṁ ||
oṁ maṇirāga vaśīkuru sarvārthān ānayākāśagarbha hūṁ ||
tatra madhye likhet samyag ratnamālādharaṁ param ||
oṁ ratnavṛṣṭi pravarṣaya sarvārthasaṁpado bhagavan maṇihasta hūṁ ||
oṁ maṇidaṁṣṭrākarālamahāyakṣa hara hara sarvārthān bhīṣāpaya hūṁ ||
oṁ sarvaratākarṣa āryāruṇamahāsattva bhagavantam ākāśagarbhaṁ codayākarṣaya śīghraṁ ho jaḥ ||
oṁ sarvaratnapraveśasamaya praveṣaya samayān mahāmaṇirājakulaṁ ratnapāśa hūṁ ||
athātra mahāmaṇḍale svayaṁ maṇiratnācāryo yathāvat praviśya vidhivistaram ātmanaḥ kṛtvā,
mā te sarvajanmasu dāridryaduḥkhān mokṣo na bhaven,
tato bhagavān ākāśagarbho bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṁ jalpāpayatīty uktamātre mukhabandhaṁ muktvā, mahāmaṇḍalaṁ darśayet ||
tato yathāvibhavataḥ pūjāṁ kṛtvā sarvakāryāṇi sādhayed iti ||
nidhānaṁ khanate yatra nidhānaṁ tatra paśyati ||
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṁ vai nidhānaṁ yatra vidyate |
pīḍayet tatra tāṁ mudrāṁ svayam uttiṣṭhate tadā ||
manasā caiva jānāti nidhānaṁ yatra tiṣṭhati ||
tāṁ mudrām āviśed yatra nidhānaṁ tatra lakṣayet ||
mahāmudrāṁ samādhāya yatra kāyaṁ tu veṣṭayet |
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṁ vai yatrāviśya parisphuṭet |
samādhimudrāṁ baddhvā vai yady āviśya svayaṁ punarḥ |
brūyād yatra nidhānaṁ tu mahāratnamayaṁ bhavet ||
karmamudrāṁ tu baddhvā vai yadāviśya parasparam |
hastau bandhe tu samayāṁ nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet || iti ||
oṁ ākāśagarbha maṇiratna sphuṭa sphuṭa yatra nidhiḥ ||
baddhvā tu vai mahāmudrāṁ yatrāśaṅkā bhavet tadā |
yatra śaṅkā bhavet tatra samayāgrīṁ tu bandhayet |
yadā mokṣaṁ svayaṁ yāyān nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet ||
samādhimudrāṁ baddhvā vai śaṅkā yatra bhaved dhruvā |
jñānam upādya vijñeyaṁ nidhis tatrāsti śāśvataḥ ||
yatra bhūyo bhavec chaṅkā karmamudrāṁ tu tatra vai |
badhnīyād vidhivat tāṁ tu sphuṭej jñeyo nidhiḥ punaḥ ||
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṁ vai nidhiṁ tu parimārgayet |
yatrastho dṛḍhatāṁ yāyān nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet ||
yatrastho jñānavān bhūyān nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet ||
baddhvā karma mayīṁ mudrāṁ nidhiṁ tu parimārgayet |
yatrasthaḥ karmamudrāṁ tu bhrāmayet tatra nirdiśet ||
bhāvayaṁs tu mahāmudrāṁ samāveśān nidhiṁ labhet ||
baddhvā tu samayāgrīṁ vai rāmayaṁs tu striyaṁ tathā |
yatra mudrā dṛḍhībhūyām nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet ||
sphuṭed yatra tu sā mudrā nidhiṁ tatra vinirdiśet ||
ratnadaṁṣṭrā hared arthān maṇimuṣṭyā tu sidhyati ||
sā evāṅguṣṭhavajreṇa maṇiṁ dadyād dhṛdi sthitam ||
kuḍmalāgryā maṇiṁ baddhvā lokeśo dhanado bhavet |
sā eva valitā caiva tarjanyā tarjanīgrahā |
maṇidṛṣṭis tu sā khyātā dṛṣṭvārthānāṁ prahārikā ||
sā eva hāsasaṁsthā tu līlayā parivatitā |
maṇikośā hared arthān jagatāṁ vikrameṇa tu ||
sa tu saṁdhāya vācā vai svājñayā harate dhanam ||

div.ab: ratnamuṣṭiṁ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrās tu sādhe|| iti

lg.l: atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekadhāraṇīsamayasaṁbhavaratnādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṁ svakulasaṁbhavāṁ mudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha bhagavān āryākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svakulasamayamudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
paryaṅkasthaṁ maṇiṁ pūrvaṁ vajradhātoḥ puro likhet |
oṁ sarvārthasiddhiprade mahāvajraratnasamayamaṇi sarvārthān me sādhaya dhāraṇi hūṁ ||
oṁ vajramaṇiratnanetrānaya vaśīkuru sarvārthasaṁpadaḥ śīghraṁ dṛṣṭyaṅkuśi hūṁ ||
oṁ maṇiratnasūrye jvālaya sarvaṁ mahātejini hūṁ ||
na tvayā kasyacid ayaṁ nayo vaktavyaḥ,

div.ab: ity uktvā,

lg.l: ātmanas tu lalāṭe vai sthāpya rājā bhaved dhruvam ||
taj jñānaratnaṁ saṁsthāpya bhaved rājā svayaṁ kṛtaḥ ||
vajraratnaṁ nabhe likhya karmamudrāṁ tu bandhayet |
svasthāne tat pratiṣṭhāpya bhaved rājā svayaṁ kṛtaḥ ||
vajraratnaṁ tu hṛdaye mahāmudrāṁ tu bhāvayet |
baddhvā vai ratnavajrīṁ tu bhaved rājā tu sarvataḥ ||
baddhvā vai karmamudrāṁ tu bhaved rājā sukarmakṛt || iti
bhāvayaṁs tu mahāmudrāṁ mahārājā bhavet sa tu ||
bhāvayet sattvavajrāṁ tu samayānāṁ bhavet patiḥ ||
bhāvayan dhyānamudrāṁ tu bhaved dharmādhipo dhruvam ||
bhāvayet karmamudrāṁ tu bhavet karmādhipaḥ svam || iti
sauvarṇaṁ vāpi raupyaṁ vā vajraratnaṁ tu bhāvayet |
sauvarṇam anyaratnaṁ vā vajraratnaṁ tv anuttaram |
sthāpya bhūyo lalāṭe tu bhaved rājā mahādhanaḥ ||
sauvarṇam anyaratnaṁ vā vajraratnaṁ tu bhāvayet |
svamukhe caiva prakṣipya bhaved vācāṁ patis tu saḥ ||
sarvarṇam anyaratnaṁ vā vajraratnaṁ tu dhārayet |
uṣṇīṣe bhāvayan bhūyaḥ sarvakarmapatir bhavet || iti
mahāvajramaṇiṁ baddhvā taṁ maṇiṁ strībhage tathā |
praveśya tu mahāmudrāṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnute ||
baddhayā tu bhavet siddhir abhiṣekeṣu sarvaśaḥ ||
taṁ maṇiṁ strībhage viddhvā bhavet siddhir anuttarā ||
baddhayā tu bhavet siddhiḥ sarvakarmasv anuttarā || iti
baddhvā ratnapratiṣṭhāṁ tu lalāṭe tv abhiṣicyate ||
dvyagrānāmavikāsā tu padmaṁ kṛtvā tu sidhyati ||
bhāvayaṁs tu maṇīn eva bhavet suparivāravān ||
sa eva tarjanī vajrasaṁsthā eva tthāṅkuśī |
sā eva sūryā vartā tu mūrdhni bāhuprasāritā |
tābhiḥ padmaṁ tu saṁbhāvya madhyamābhyāṁ maṇīkṛtā ||
tāṁ tu mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya ratnavṛṣṭiṁ tu varṣayet ||
sā eva cakrayogā tu hṛdi ratnadvidhīkṛtā |
guhyaguhyāḥ samāsena siddhiṁ dadyuś caturguṇam || iti
yathā yad vajraguhye tu sarvakālaṁ na bandhayet |
ataḥ paraṁ pravakṣyāmi dharmamudrāḥ samāsataḥ || iti
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekajñānasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhanaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṁ svavidyottamam abhāṣat ||:
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svakulajñānamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
hṛdi cihnās tu saṁlekhyā dharmamanḍalayogataḥ || iti
mā te maraṇakālaḥ śīghram evāsiddhasya syāt |
bhāvayan yācayed arthān dehi ratna iti bruvan ||
bhāvayan yācayed ratnān dehi dehīti vāg bruvan ||
samāpattyā tu saddharmaṁ dehi jñāneti yācayet ||
samāpattyā tu satkarma karme dehīti yācayet || iti
oṁ dehi saddharmaṁ bhagvan vajragarbha satsattva ||
oṁ dehi bhagavan satkarma bhagavan vajragarbha ||
yadā tu hṛdayaṁ kampet tataḥ siddho dhanaṁ dadet ||
yadā tu karmapate śīrṣam abhiṣekaṁ sa lapsyati ||
vajragarbhaṁ mukhe viddhvā lābhayet tatra eva hi |
yadā tu sphuṭate tat tu tadā vāg asya sidhyati ||
yadā tu jvalate tat tu tadaivordhvaṁgamo bhavet || iti
yācayed dehi siddhiṁ me ili ratneti sidhyati ||
yācayed dehi me dharmaṁ cili ratneti lapsyati ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā parāṁ siddhim avāpnute ||
taṁ priyaṁ yasya ramayet sarvalokaṁ sa rāgayet ||
atha bhagavān punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekakarmasamayasaṁbhavādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva imāṁ svakarmasaṁbhavāṁ vidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||
atha vajranetro bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhaṣat ||
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattva imāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ svakulakarmamaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṁs tu svabhiṣekān sa lapsyati ||
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṁs tu nāśayej jagad uttamam ||
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṁs tu sarvārthāṁl labhate kṣaṇāt || iti
pūjayan sarvabuddhāṁs tu sarvalokaṁ sa rāgayet || iti
vajraratnāṁ dvidhīkṛtya karmamudrāḥ sa sādhayet || iti
atha bhagavān ratnamudrāṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyemāṁ svavidyottamām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajrapāṇir bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajragarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajranetro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||:
atha vajraviśvo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṁ svamudrām abhāṣat ||
athāryākāśagarbho bidhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ maṇikulacaturmudrāmaṇḍalam abhāṣat ||:
lalāṭe tu pratiṣṭhāpya sarvasiddhim avapnuyat || iti
oṁ vajraratna sarvābhiṣekasarvasiddhayo me prayaccha rala rala hūṁ traḥ ||
paṭiṁ vāpi priyāṁ vā pi striyaṁ vā puruṣo 'pi vā |
oṁ vajraratna sakhividyādharatvaṁ prayaccha śīghram abhiṣiñcāhi
athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattva idaṁ sarvārthasiddhiṁ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣat ||:
yathāvat tu samālekhyaṁ sarvasiddhes tu maṇḍalam || iti
rūpādīnāṁ tu kāmānām aviraktaḥ sukhāni tu |
niryātayaṁs tu buddhebhyaḥ kalpasiddhim avāpunte || iti
evaṁ paṭādiṣu sattvaṁ mudrāṁ vā maṇḍaleṣu likhya sādhayed iti ||
atha sarvatathāgataḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyākāśagarbhaṁ mahābodhisattvam anena sādhkāradānenācchāditavantaḥ ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
sādhu te vajradharmāya sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
