(2134: no text)

lg.l: ihaiva janmani varaṁ yadīcched uttamaṁ śivam |
buddhatvaṁ tena kāryedaṁ na cet siddhir yathopari ||
ihaiva janmani padaṁ yadīcchet sauriṇaṁ śubham |
ātmanas tena kāryedaṁ na cet siddhir yathopari ||
yathā vajradharaḥ siddhis tathāham iti bhāvayan |
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari || iti
svabhāvaśuddhyā vācā vai sarvadharmā iti bruvan |
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari || iti
buddhasauritvam āpnoti na cet siddhir yathopari || iti
sādhayaṁs tu mahāmudrāṁ buddhatvam iha janmani || iti
yathā vajradharaḥ siddhas tathāham iti bhāvayan |
anakṣareṣu dharmeṣu prapañco na hi vidyate |
idaṁ vadaṁs tu dharmāgrīṁ bhāvayan sauritāṁ vrajet || iti
yat karoti hi karmaṁ vai śubhaṁ vā yadi vāśubham |
niryātayañ jinebhyas tu kṣaṇāt sauritāṁ vrajet || iti
tasyāvirāgo dharmo 'smin mahāyāne tu sidhyati || iti
sphārayed vidhivad yogāt kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnuyāt || iti
svabhāvaśuddhaḥ saṁrāga iti brūyād imaṁ nayam |
iti bhāvanāṁ bhāvayan vai kṣaṇāt sauritvam āpnute || iti
vadan dharmamayīṁ mudrām iha sauritvam āpnute || iti
udyogāt sauritāṁ yāti na cet siddhir yathopari || iti
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvatathāgatasamayasiddhitantram udājahāra ||:
alpatve vā bahutve vā yathābhirucitaṁ punaḥ |
avandhyo divaśaḥ kāryo dānena samayo hy ayam || iti
buddho dharma iti khyāta ity uktvā dharmatākṣaram |
akruddho 'pi hi saṁduṣṭān mārayañ chuddhim āpnute ||
aliptaṁ salilaiḥ padmaṁ tathā rāgo na duṣyati |
iti bruvann akāryāṇi kurvan pāpair na lipyate ||
dānāt samo na dharmo 'sti pratipattyā bravīti hi |
mahāmaṇikuladharmaḥ, na cet siddhir yathopari || iti
duṣṭasattvopaghātāya yad yat kāryaṁ karoti saḥ |
buddhānāṁ dehināṁ caiva karma sarvārthasādhakam || iti
etad buddhasya buddhatvaṁ na buddho bhavate 'nyataḥ ||
bhāvayan dharmatām etām avāpnoti svakarmatām || iti
yathāvarṇe tu tau vetti tathā lokaṁ tu vetti saḥ ||
śuddhe śuddham iti jñeyaṁ pāṇḍare tu prabhāsvaram |
svayaṁ kāyaṁ yathā vetti tathā vedyaṁ jaganmanaḥ ||
ākāśe vānyadeśe vā kruddhaḥ san maṇḍalāni tu |
yādṛśāni tu paśyed vai vijñeyaṁ tādṛśaṁ mahaḥ ||
yādṛgvarṇaṁ samāsena vetti cittaṁ sa tādṛśam ||
sarvalokaṁ nirīkṣan vai pratibhāso hi yādṛśaḥ |
paśyate tādṛśaṁ caiva jagaccittaṁ tu lakṣayet || iti
kurvantyaś ca bhramantyo vā yathā paśyet tathā gamaḥ ||
yasya yasya ca sattvasya samāpattya tu cintayet |
tasya tasya tathā caiva sarvacittāni budhyati ||
svamudrāsattvam ātmānaṁ sākṣād iva sa paśyati ||
tādṛśeṣv eva bimbeṣu madhye śyāmaṁ niyacchati |
siddhir vajrakulasyāgrā bhavec chīghraṁ yad icchati ||
sphuranto raśmimaṇḍāni paśyan siddhiṁ laghv āpnuyāt || iti
bhāvayan bodhisattvāṁś ca darśayet kāyatas tathā ||
tena yac cintayet kiñcit sudūrād api paśyati ||
tena yac cintayet kāryaṁ sudūrasthaṁ śṛṇoti hi ||
tena yaṁ sattvam udvīkṣec cittaṁ jānāti tasya saḥ ||
mahāmudrāṁ samādhāya ātmano vā parasya vā |
manasā paśyate rūpaṁ yato janma sa āvahet ||
mahāmudrāṁ samādhāya yāṁ yām ṛddhim abhīpsati |
yatra vā tatra vā tad vai saṁdarśayet samādhinā ||
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasatyasiddhitantram udājahāra ||:
pālayaṁs tu mahāsatyaṁ laghu buddhatvam āpnuyāt ||
pālayan vajrasatyaṁ tu siddhim agryām avāpnute ||
vajradhāryām u śapathāṁ kṛtvā tu duratikramām |
pālayet satyam etad dhi yadīcchet siddhim uttamām ||
pālayed uttamaṁ satyam abhiṣekaṁ sa lapsyati ||
samayas tvam iti prokte sarvamudrākuleṣv api |
svayaṁ baddhvā dṛḍhaṁ yānti tataḥ paścād asādhitāḥ ||
suratas tvam iti proite sarvamudrā asādhitāḥ |
svayaṁ baddhvā tu sidhyante tattvacodān mahātmanaḥ ||
svayaṁ bandhed bandayed vāpi svayaṁ vāpi parasya vā || iti
sarvaśuddha iti prokte svato vāpi parasya vā |
strīsaṅgādyās tu saṁyogā na mokṣaṁ yānti sarvaśaḥ || iti
sarvalokeṣu caivāgryāḥ pūjāś caiva svayaṁbhuvām || iti
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasiddhimudrātantram udājahāra ||:
sādhayan sidhyate śīghraṁ buddhabodhir api sthirā ||
purato vajrasattvaṁ ca siddhiḥ śīghratarā bhavet ||
bhāvayan vajrasattvaṁ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet ||
bhāvayaṁl lokanāthaṁ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet ||
bhāvayan vajragarbhaṁ ca siddhis tu dviguṇā bhavet ||
baddhvā vai sarvamudrās tu tataḥ sidhyanti tatkṣaṇāt ||
sādhayet sarvamudrās tu kāmo 'ham iti bhāvayan |
badhnīyāt sarvamudrās tu siddhiṁ yānti hi tatkṣaṇāt ||
padmabimbaṁ svam ātmānaṁ bhāvayan svayam ātmanā |
hṛdy ūrṇāyāṁ gale mūrdhni sthāpya buddhair adhiṣṭhyate ||
hṛdy ūrṇāyāṁ tathā kaṇṭhe mūrdhni sthāpyādhiṣṭhyate ||
kṛtvā tu vajraratnety abhiṣikto jinair bhavet ||
samārabhya catuḥpārśve mālayā tv abhiṣicyati || iti
japan vai mantravidyās tu śīghraṁ siddhim avāpnute ||
rāgāt tvam asi saṁbhūtaḥ krodho 'ham iti bhāvayan |
hṛnmudrāmantravidyās tu samādhayaṁs tu sarvago bhavet ||
pūrvaṁ dhūpādibhiḥ pūjāṁ kṛtvā tu susamāhitaḥ |
tatas tu siddhikāmo vai sādhayan siddhim āpnuyāt || iti
ātmaniryātanādyair vā pūjāṁ kurvaṁs tu sidhyati ||
krodhamuṣṭiṁ prakurvan vai śīghraṁ sidhyet kulaṁ mama ||
sidhyate maṇikulaṁ sarvaṁ dadan dānāni sidhyati ||
caturbhiḥ prātihāryais tu vajraviśvaṁ sa sādhayet ||
kāye buddhasamādhis tu svabhijñā saugatī tv iyam |
tasyāḥ suprativedhatvād bauddhīṁ siddhim svāpnuyāt || iti
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṁ bhūtvā parāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt || iti
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṁ bhūtvā śuddhāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt ||
pañcābhijñaḥ svayaṁ bhūtvā sarvasiddhir varā bhavet ||
buddhabodhir iyaṁ jñānaṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
mahābodhir iyaṁ jñānaṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
mahābodhir iyaṁ jñānaṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
mahābodhir iyaṁ jñānaṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
mahābodhir iyaṁ jñānaṁ bhāvayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
sattvārthaṁ ca prakurvan vai buddhabodhyarthikaḥ svayam |
yathāviṣaya yāṁ(-vān?) bhūtvā vajrasattvaṁ tu sādhayet |
tac ca buddhārthato yojyam idaṁ buddhānurāgaṇam ||
rāgo vai nāvamantavyo viśuddhaḥ sukahdas tathā |
kāmaṁ sevya sukhātmā tu suratas tvam iti bruvan |
rañjed vā rāgayec caiva vinayārthaṁ vaśaṁkaram ||
manasā kāyavāgbhyāṁ vā marayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
ātmano duḥkhadānāc ca hūṁkāreṇa tu mārayet || iti
ātmanaś ca visaṁvādān mārayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
dāridryāc caiva sattvānāṁ mārayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatarakṣāmudrāsiddhitantram udājahāra ||:
iyaṁ rakṣā tu mahatī śāśvatī siddhidā kṣaṇāt ||
bhakir vai vajrahūṁkāre rakṣeyaṁ svaparasya vā ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvo bhagavantam etad avocat |:
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇaye bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāram adāt ||:
sādhu sādhuvajrapāṇe subhāṣitaṁ, parigṛhīto 'smābhir adhiṣṭhitaś ca || iti
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, vajrapāṇaye mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adadan |:
sādhu te vajradattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |

div.ab: sarvakulakalpaguhyavidhivistaratantram

lg.l: sattvavajrāṁ hṛdi baddhvā bhāryā me tvam atipriyā |
dṛḍhībhava iti prokte sarvamudrās tu sādhayet ||
guhyabhāryam iti prokte sutarāṁ siddhim āpnuyāt ||
mārayan sarvabuddhāṁs tu bhayāt siddhiṁ dadanti hi ||
svadāraṁ paradāraṁ vā priyāṁ siddhim avāpnute ||
samayas tvam iti proktvā rāgayet sarvayoṣitaḥ |
mā virāgaya sattvārthaṁ bruvan buddhān sa rāgayet ||
vajriṇo guhyasamayam idaṁ rakṣaṁs tu sidhyati ||
hūṁkārais tu viśuddhyarthaṁ samayo hy arthasiddhidaḥ || iti
rāgaḥ śuddhātmanāṁ śuddho hy aśuddhas tīrthyayoginām |
śuddhātmanāṁ tu samayaṁ pālayan siddhim āpnuyāt ||
duṣṭānāṁ tu harann arthān samayaḥ siddhido bhavati ||
sarvakāryāṇi kurvan vai bauddhīṁ siddhim avāpnute ||
yoṣitāṁ vā priyāṇāṁ vā siddhim āpnoty anuttarām iti ||
strīkāryaṁ praviśan yonyā vaśīkuryāt tu yoṣitaḥ ||
striyāḥ kāye spharet samayaṅ niśceṣṭām api rāgayet ||
praviśaṁs tu bhage kruddhaḥ manasā sa tu pātayet ||
bhagena praviśan rakṣed api sarvās tu yoṣitaḥ ||
bhagena praviśan strīṇām kṣaṇād āviśya natrtati ||
praviṣṭvaiva hi tad guhyaṁ brūyād buddhasya tatkṣaṇāt |
bhāryā hy etās tava vibho dadasva mama sarvada ||
evaṁ brvaṁs tu sarveṣu kulamudrānayeṣu ca |
surate samayas tvaṁ hoḥ vajrasattvādya siddhyayām ||
idaṁ japaṁs tu hṛdayaṁ sādhayet sarvasiddhayaḥ |
taṁ praviṣṭvaiva śīghraṁ hi brūyāt siddhiṁ tu yācayan |
rāgāt tvam asi saṁbhūta evaṁ sarveṣu sidhyati ||
maṇḍalāni likhet prājñas taṁ praviṣṭvaiva vāg vadet ||
evam uktvā tu sarveṣu maṇḍaleṣu sa sidhyati ||
mahāmaṇiklānāṁ tu taṁ pratiṣṭvaiva vāg vadet ||
evaṁ brvaṁs tu sarveṣu maṇḍaleṣu praveṣataḥ |
tataḥ prabhoṛti siddhātmā sādhayan siddhayaḥ sadā |
yadā na laghu siddhiḥ syāt sidhyate tattvacodanaiḥ ||
satyānuparivartinyā vāksatyaiḥ śāpitā yan na sidhyate ||
mahāmudrāṁ tu vai baddhvā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ |
idaṁ tattvaṁ rahasyaṁ ca vajravācā vaden nayam ||
vajrasattvaḥ svayam ahaṁ tvaṁ me bhāryā hṛdi sthitā |
sidhya sidhyādya samaye samayo 'haṁ tvaṁ priyā mama |
budhya budhya mahāsattvi bhāryā me tvam atipriyā |
iti codanayā śīghram anuraktā tu sidhyati ||
sarvakarmakarī bhāryā tvaṁ me sidhyādya vajriṇi |
iti codanayā śīghram anuraktā tu sidhyati ||
vijñāya śraddadhac chrāddho duḥsādhyo 'pi hi sidhyati ||
māraṇaṁ samayaṁ tv agram idaṁ vijñāya sidhyati ||
mahābhūtoḍbhavaṁ sarvaṁ kathaṁ tv aśucir udyate |
strīprasaṅgāt tu ratnānāṁ saṁcayaḥ kriyate yadā |
striyo hy anuttaraṁ ratnam iti cintya sa sidhyati ||
tat pariṣvaṅgasaukhyaṁ tu niryātya hi sa sidhyati ||
lokeśvaram ahaṁ bhāvya priyāvaktraṁ nirīkṣan vai |
tan nirīkṣaṇasaukhyaṁ tu niryātya hi sa sidhyati ||
striyaṁ pariṣvajya pūjāyāṁ vibhūṣitaṁ niryātya sidhyati ||
ramayan paradārāṇi yathākaś cin na vedayet |
bhāvayan buddham ātmānaṁ pūjayā siddhim āpnuyāt ||
nānyad asti hi teneyaṁ guhyapūjā niruttarā ||
yac cittaṁ sarvasattvānāṁ dṛḍhatvāt sattva ucyate |
sa eva bhagavān sattvo vajrakāmas tathāgataḥ ||
sa eva bhagavān sattvo vajrasattvo hṛdi sthitaḥ |
ratnas tu racanād uktaḥ sūryas tejovidhānataḥ |
ketuḥ samucchrayaḥ proktaḥ smito hāsas tu kīrtitaḥ ||
cakro maṇḍalayogāt tu vāglāpāj japa ucyate ||
yathā hi bhagavān śaśvan vajrasattvas tu sarvagaḥ |
tathā vajraṁ tu cihnādi bhāvayann iti sidhyati ||
yathā hi samayais tīvraiḥ kaś cid bandho bhavej janaḥ |
nātikramanty ā maraṇād iti vijñāya sidhyati ||
ayaṁ bandha iti jñātvā dharmam asya prasidhyati ||
anatikramaṇīyā hi vajrājñā karma bhūri ca |
ājñāvatas tu tat karma vijñāya laghusidhyati ||
atha khalu bhagavān vajrapāṇiṁ mahābodhisattvam evam āha ||:
idam api mayā bhagavan parigṛhītam adhiṣṭhitaṁ ceti ||
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, vajrapāṇaye sarvatathāgatādhipataye sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
buddhānusmṛtimān bhūtvā vajra vajra iti bruvan |
hūṁ hūṁ hūṁ hūm iti procya siddhim āpnoty anuttarām ||
śudhya śudhya iti procya hy uttamāṁ siddhim āpnuyāt ||
sidhya sidhya iti procya hy arthasiddhiḥ parā bhavet ||
akāras tena dharmāṇām anutpāda iti smṛtaḥ ||
sarvatāthāgataṁ tattvam idaṁ sūtraṁ tu śaraddadhan |
bhāvayann idam ādyaṁ tu dharmeṇāśu prasidhyati ||
imaṁ maṇikule dharmaṁ bhāvayann āśu sidhyati ||
idaṁ bhāvayamānas tu parāṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt || iti
purataḥ prakāśayen mudrāḥ siddhir āsāṁ suguhyataḥ ||
tadā khe dhāvataḥ śubhās tatrākārāḥ sa paśyati ||
tadā jānīta matimān buddhacakṣur idaṁ mama |
yāvanto bhāvā vidyante sthāvarā jaṅgamās tathā |
teṣāṁ ca pratibimbāni paśyati khe pradhāvataḥ ||
jānan vai pūjayā sddhim āpnoty anuttarām ||
tān dṛṣṭvā na hi bidhyeta mudrās tā vajrasaṁbhavāḥ |
śvetān raktān sitān pītān yadā paśyanti maṇḍalān |
yadā tu paśyate khe tu khacakṣuḥ sidhyate sadā ||
kāmādyāḥ sarvasaukhyā me sadaiva hṛdaye sthitāḥ |
aho sattvārthatā nāma virāgo yatra deśayate ||
bhāvayan pūjayed buddhān uttamāṁ siddhim āpnuyāt ||
saṁlikhya tu bhagākāraṁ kuḍye meḍhraṁ samutthitam |
yāṁ striyaṁ cintayed vṛddhaṁ kuryāt sāsya vaśībhavet ||
nihatya cakṣurdeśe tu samākarṣet striyo varāḥ ||
padmaṁ gṛhya karābhyāṁ tu nirīkṣan rāgaśuddhitām |
vajradṛṣṭyā tu sa strīṇāṁ gamayed antitas tathā ||
pūjākarmavidhiṁ yojya yad yat kāryaṁ tu cintayet |
tat tad vijñāpya mudrāṁ tu sādhayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ ||
yatkāryaṁ vadate tat tu śīghraṁ siddhim avāpnuyāt ||
yat kiñcit cintayet prājñaḥ sa śīghraṁ siddhim eṣyati ||
yat kāryaṁ cintayet prājñaḥ tat sarvaṁ śīghram āpnuyāt ||
yat kāryaṁ cintayet prājñaḥ tat sarvaṁ sidhyati kṣaṇāt ||
sattvo hi sarvapratyātmā mamāpy ātmani saṁsthitaḥ |
ity adhiṣṭhāya sattvo 'ham ahaṁkāreṇa bhāvayan sidhyati ||
yathā sattvas tathā mudrā yathā mudrās tathā hy aham |
vāṅmudrāṇāṁ tu tāḥ sarvāḥ mahāsattvasamādhir hi ||
atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya,
bhagavate sarvatathāgatacakravarine vajrapāṇaye mahābodhisattvāya sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ ||:
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisatt imāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||:
durdṛṣṭāṁ viraktānām idaṁ guhyaṁ na yugyate |
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar api sarvatathāgatpacāravidhivistaram abhāṣat ||:
mahāmaṇḍalaṁ dṛṣṭvā dhūpapuṣpadīpagandhapūjāṁ mudrābhiḥ kṛtvā tato vajravācā jāpam ārabhet ||
yathāsthānasthitaś caturmāsaṁ catuḥsaṁdhyaṁ dhūpādibhir yathāvat pūjāṁ kṛtvā,

div.ab: tato 'viraktaḥ sarvakāmaguṇeṣu sarvāhāraḥ sarvakāmopabhogī hṛdayārthataḥ svam ātmānaṁ buddhabimbaṁ purato vāṅmātreṇāpi bhāvayan yathākāmakaraṇīyatayāṣṭaśataṁ vajravācā jāpann āśu prasidhyati.

lg.l: tataḥ icchantena paṭe bhagavantaṁ tathāgataṁ madhye lekhayet |
tasya caturmāhāsattvamaṇḍalayogena yathābhirucitavarṇābharaṇā mahāsattvāś candramaṇḍalapratiṣṭhitā lekhyāḥ koṇabhāgeṣu kuladevya iti ||
tataḥ paṭasyodārāṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā, yathāvaj japayogena tāvaj japed yāvan māsacatuṣṭayam |
paṭasyāgrato vajravācā śatasahasraṁ yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā yathāvad bandhan muñcaṁś ca japet ||
tato 'nte sakalāṁ rātrim aviśramataḥ kaṁ cit kālaṁ muñcan yathavac ca bandhan japet |
tato mudrā jvalaty āviśaty uttiṣṭhati vācaṁ muñcati || iti
sarvamudrāś ca baddhamātrā yathāvat sarvakarmāṇi kurvanti |
tena sūkṣmavajrād ārabhya, yaṁ samādhiṁ abhirocet taṁ hṛdayayogato 'bhyaset tāvad yāvac caturmāsam |
tato 'nte sakalāṁ rātriṁ paryaṅkabaddhaḥ samāpannaḥ sthātavyaḥ. tetathāgatādyāḥ sarvasiddhaya āmukhībhavati ||

div.ab: tato yādṛśy abhirucis tādṛśīsiddhiḥ
tataḥ sarvakarmasiddhim avāpntoti

lg.l: āveśayet ca candanena sugandhena spṛṣṭāspṛṣṭavajrāṅkuśaśarahastaratnasūryadhvajadantapaṅkutipadmakhaḍgacakrajihvāsarvavajrakavacadaṁṣṭrāmuṣṭimudrādīni sarvabhāvāny āveśayati sakṛj japtena |
māyākarma ca mayūrapattrapicchake vajrān viddhvā bandhayet |
tatas taṁ mayūrāṅgapicchakaṁ sattvavajrimudrayāvapīḍya tāvaj japed yāvat sarvatathāgatamudrāviśati ||
tataś ca picchakān nānādyāni rūpāṇi paśyati ||
tataḥ prabhṛti tena picchakena sarvarūpāṇi vidhivad darśayati |
daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu tathāgatāḥ sasarṣanmaṇḍalāḥ samārasenādharṣaṇādibuddharddhivikurvitāni kurvanto darśayati |
vaśīkaraṇaṁ kartukāmaḥ sarvatathāgatasattvavajrīmudrāṁ baddhvā tāvaj japed yāvat sā mudrā jvalati ||
tataḥ prabhṛti mudrābandhena sarvatathāgatān apy ārāgayati vaśīkaroti kiṁ punaru anyān sattvān ||
atha laukikottamasiddhayaḥ sādhayitukāmena tenādita eva tathaiva japatā māsam ekam aṣṭasāhasrikeṇa japena,
tathaiva sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet tāvad yāvan mudrā jvalati ||
tataḥ prabhṛti mudrābandhena laukikasiddhividyādharasiddhīnām ekatarā bhavati ||
atha sādhayitum icchantena yathāvat paṭaḥ śeśrāpayitavyaḥ |
māsam ekaṁ sarvakāmabhojī yathākāmakaraṇīyatayāṣṭasāhasrikeṇa jāpena catuḥsaṁdhyā vajravācā japet |
tāvad yāvan māsānte paṭasyodārāṁ pūjāṁ kṛtvā,
tāvaj japed yāvat tasmān mudrābandhād dhūṁkāraśabda udbilasṛtaḥ |
tataḥ prabhāte maheśvarādayo devādhipatayaḥ sagaṇaparivārāḥ puraḥ sthitvājñāṁ mārgayanti ||

div.ab: tato vidyādhareṇaivaṁ vaktavyam

lg.l: yadāhaṁ brūyām “āgacchatedaṁ kuruta”, tadā bhavadbhir āgatya mamājñā kāryā || iti
yathecchayā ca muhūrtamātreṇa sakalaṁ tribhuvanam ājñāpayan bhramati |
punar apy eti ca nigrahānugrahaṁ kurvan,
divyāni trilokabhogāni copabhuñjan, yathākāmakaraṇīyatayā savasurādhipatiyoṣitādyāḥ sarvayoṣita ārāgayitvopabhuñjati |
na ca tasya kaś cit kiṁ cic chaknoti kartum |
hūṁkāreṇa ca sarvaduṣṭadevādīn pātayan, tato 'ntarakalpasahasrāṇi jīvati |
māsānte vajrahūṁkārasamayamudraṁ baddhvā sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |

div.ab: tato yathāvan mudrābandhena hūṁkāraprayuktenākāśagamanaviśvasaṁdarśanāntardhānamāyāsaṁdarśanasarvāveśanākarṣaṇavaśīkaraṇasarvatuṣṭisaṁjananasarvaratnābhiharaṇamahātejojvālāsaṁdarśanaratnavṛṣṭisaṁdarśanamahāṭṭahāsapramuñcanasarvasattvasaṁśodhanachindanabhindanartucakraparivartanayathāvattattvollāpanasarvakarmapravartanarakṣājambhanastambhatrāsanamāraṇasarvasattvamudraṇakāmaratikriyāpravartanābhiṣekasarvabhāvagāyāpananṛtyāpanāhvāpanapraveśanasphoṭanāveśanādīni sarvakarmāṇi karoti

lg.l: tena vajrahūṁkārasamādhim abhyasatā tathaiva jāpayogena māsam ekaṁ sādhayitavyam |
tato 'nte tenaiva samādhinā sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |
tāvad yāvat prabhāte pañcābhijño bhūtvā sarvasattvānugrahanigrahakṣamo bhavati
tena tathaiva japatā māsam ekaṁ sādhayitavyam ||
sakṛd uccāritena manīṣitayā rakṣādīni sarvakarmāṇi karoti ||
paṭe bhagavantaḥ sarvajagadvinayādyāḥ kartavyās tasya sarvapārśveṣu caturmaṇḍalayogena mahāsattvacatuṣṭayaḥ kāryante ca devyaḥ |
tataḥ sa eva japavidhivistaro māsānte sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |
tena tathaiva padmavajrimudrābandhaṁ kṛtvā yathāvan muñcyāṣṭasāharikeṇa japena catuḥsaṁdhyaṁ japet |
tena tathaiva māsānte sakalāṁ rātriṁ yathābhirucitena samādhinā japo dātavyaḥ |
tathaiva japya māsānte sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |
tatrādita eva sarvatathāgatapraṇāmacatuṣṭayaṁ kṛtvā śatasahasraṁ japet |
tatas tathiava paṭe bhagavantaṁ sarvārthasiddhiṁ caturmudrāmaṇḍalayogena likhet |
tatas tathaiva pūjāṁ kṛtvā tathaiva sādhayet |
tataḥ prabhāte bhagavān sarvatathāgatābhiṣekaratna ākāśagarbho bodhisattva āgatyābhiṣekaṁ dadāti |
tena tathaiva dharmavajriprayogeṇa vajraratnamudrā yathāvat sādhyā sarvāśākarmakarī bhavati |
imaṁ samādhiṁ catuḥsaṁdhyaṁ bhāvya japed yathopari |
tato māsānte tenaiva samādhinā sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |
tena tathaiva japatā māsānte sakalāṁ rātriṁ japet |
tataḥ prabhāte bhagavān ākāśagarbhaḥ sarvārthasādhako bhavatīti |
hṛdayamanīṣitāni sarvatathāgatānāṁ sidhyantām ity uccārya hṛdayaṁ yathābhirucito japya sādhanavidhiḥ kartavya iti ||
sarvamudrā me priyā bhavantv ity uktvā samayamudrāṁ baddhvā yathābhirucito yathāśaktyā japet |
sarvatathāgatasamādhayo me ājāyantām ity ukutvā mantraṁ yathābhirucito japet |
avidyāndhā bateme sattvāḥ sarvatathāgatāś ca vidyādhigamasaṁvarabhūtā ity uktvā vidyāṁ yathābhirucito japya sādhanam āvahet ||
yasya sattvasya hṛn mudrāṁ mantraṁ vidyāṁ tu sādhayet |
jāpārthatas tam ātmānaṁ sattvaṁ vā sādhya sidhyati ||
tad yatha, arthaniṣpattisiddhiḥ, ṛddhisiddhiḥ, vidyādharatvam, mahāsiddhiś ceti ||
yatra nidhiśaṅkā bhavet tatra mudrāṁ baddhvā svasamādhinā tan nidhisthānaṁ vajradṛṣṭyā nrīkṣayet |
yadi vajrākāramūrtiścutaṁ paśyati tato jñātavyaṁ nidhir atrāstīti ||
yāṁ mudrāṁ sādhayed vajrasddhir ity uktvā rddhisiddhiś caturvidhā bhavati |
ākāśagāmī ca yojanasahasramūrdhnam utpataty adhastāc ca gacchaty āgacchati ||
sarvadikṣu ca yojanasahasrād adhvena manobhirucitāḥ sarvastriyo 'ṅge samutkṣipyānayati ||
na cāsya kaścit kiṁ cic chaknoti kartum |
yad vajreṇāpy adhṛṣyo bhavati, kiṁ punar apy anyaiḥ ||

div.ab: daśapuruṣasahasrabalī, nityārogyavān, nityaṁ sarvakāmopabhojī, sadā yauvano, divyarūpī, sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyan pūjayaṁś cānuttaravajrasiddhiś catvāri varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati
sarvasukhāni paribhuñjan dviraṣṭavarṣavapur ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśadhārimahāvajravidyādharaḥ sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyan mahākalpasthāyī bhavati

lg.l: svamudrāsattvarūpī bhavaty ekakṣaṇena daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu viśvarūpī viśvakriyāpravartakaḥ
sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān dṛṣṭvā sarvākāravaropetābhiḥ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṁpūjyāśeṣānavaśeṣasattvārthaṁ ca kṛtvā punar apy āyāti ||

div.ab: sarvalokadhātusarvakāmasarvasukhasaumanasyāni sarvākāravaropetāny upabhuñjan vajrasattvasamo mahābodhisattvo 'śeṣānavaśeṣamahākalpāyur bhavati

lg.l: *hūṁkārahuṁkāra-, ed.prayuktamātre maheśvarādayaḥ sarvatrailokyādhipatayaḥ saparivārāḥ sādhakasya purata. āgatyājñāvaśyavidheyā bhavanti ||
duṣṭadevādayaś ca sarvasattvān *hūṁkāreṇa huṁkāreṇa, ed. damayati |

div.ab: sarvatathāgatavajra*hūṁ-huṁ, ed.kārarūpī sakalatrilokam ājñayā vartayan sarvatathāgatān savajrasattvān paśyann ārāgayaṁś ca varṣasahasraṁ jīvati

lg.l: tasya tasya siddhasya caturvidham abhiṣeko bhavati |
tatra vajrābhiṣeke labdhe sarvatathāgatānāṁ vajradharo bhavati |

div.ab: tatreyaṁ sukhasaumanasya siddhir yad uta guhyapūjābhir nityaṁ sarvatathāgatapūjāṁ kurvan, sarvatathāgatasarvasukhasaumanasya siddhim avāpnoti
svaṁ padmasamādhinā padmaṁ hasena gṛhya sādhayan lokeśvararūpī sarvākāravaropetaś caturvarṣasahasraṁ jīvati

lg.l: yad uta svābhiṣekaniryātanapradīpadānapāramitāpāripūrir yathāśaktyā ratnasādhanaṁ cety ābhiḥ siddhibhiḥ sarvatathāgatān pūjayann acirāt sidhyati
atha sarvakalpopāyasiddhitantram anuvyākhyasyāmīty āha bhagavān anādisattvaḥ ||
yathā vineyo loko hi tādṛśīsiddhir iṣyate |
upāyas tatra mudrā hi sarvasiddhipradaṁ mahat ||
upāyas tatra tv anudāryaṁ sarvasiddhipradaṁ varam ||
atha sarvakalpapuṇyasiddhitantram anuvyākhyāsyāmīty āha bhagavān sarvatathāgataḥ ||
rakṣaṁs tu samayaṁ guhyaṁ mahāpuṇyam avāpnute |
dānam agryaṁ hi puṇyānāṁ dadan puṇyam avāpnute |

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: prajñā nairvedhikī nāma samāsiddhir iti kīrtitā |
tayā tu mudrāḥ sidhyante bhāvayan sidhyati kṣaṇāt ||
prajñayā bhāvayann evam āśu siddhir dhruvā bhavet ||
atha sarvakalpasaṁbhārasiddhitantram anuvyākhyasyāmīty āha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ ||
kuśalānāṁ tu dharmāṇāṁ tataḥ sidhyati saṁbhṛtaḥ ||
sa eva bhagavān sattvaḥ sarvacittaḥ svayaṁprabhuḥ |
vajrasattvā iti khyātas tasmin vajre pratiṣṭhitaḥ ||
niṣkramya hṛdayād viśvo viśvarūpo bhavaty api ||
sarvadhāturajaḥsaṁkhyāḥ sa eva tu jino bhavet |
tebhyo vai vajrakāyebhyo vajrasattvas tu saṁbhavet ||
cihnebhyas tu mahāsattvās tebhyaḥ sarvam idaṁ nayam ||
ya idaṁ śṛṇuyāt kaścic chraddhadhed dhārayed dhṛdi |
bhāvayec ca sadā tuṣṭaḥ sa śīghraṁ siddhim āpnuyāt ||
buddhānām avikalpaṁ tu jñānaṁ bhavati śāśvatam |
avikalpāt tato jñānāt kalpanāt kalpaḥ udyate ||
yam ālikhya hi kalpante vidhayaḥ kalpasiddhidaḥ |
rāgo vikalpasaṁbhūtaḥ sa ca padme pratiṣṭhitaḥ |
tatas tu kalpasthāyinyaḥ siddhayaḥ sa bhavanti hi ||
maṇayo hy avikalpās tu prabhāvaiḥ susamucchritāḥ |
evaṁ tu siddhayo divyāḥ saṁbhavanty avikalpitāḥ ||
anatikramaṇīyo hi durbhedyo guhya eva ca |
vidyate vedanā siddhis tena vidyā prakīrtitā ||
hṛdayaṁ jāpya vijñeyam ātmano vā parasya vā |
bhavyaṁ bhūtaṁ bhaviṣyaṁ ca yaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ca ||
mudrām ekatarāṁ baddhvā yathāvad vidhim ātmanaḥ |
kṛtvā nirīkṣel lokaṁ tu sarvaṁ jñeyaṁ yathopari ||
sakṛd uccārayan mantraṁ brūyāj jihvāṁ svakīṁ tu yaḥ |
bhavyaṁ bhūtaṁ bhaviṣyaṁ ca tat sarvaṁ satyam āvahet ||
sakṛd uccārya vidyāṁ tu vedayan manasā sa tu |

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: yathā tathābhiṣaṇṇās tu paryaṅkena tu sādhayet |
utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkraman vā yathā tathā |
anucchvāsam ivocchvāsaṁ or ucchvasan vā anucchvāsaṁ
jāpate vinayaiś cāpi sarvam āśu prasidhyati ||
yathā padmam aliptaṁ tu vāsadoṣaiḥ surāgavān |
tathā me rāgadoṣais tu bhave rāgaḥ sa sidhyati ||
ratnavarṣāṇi varṣayaṁ siddhaḥ sann āśu sidhyati ||
utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā bhraman vāpi yathā tathā |
yathā tathā sthitaś caiva kurvan vāpi yathā tathā |
baddhvā yathā tathā śīghraṁ padmasiddhim avāpnuyāt
atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha |
pratipadyata, bhagavantas tathāgatā idaṁ kalpam adhiṣṭhitum iti ||
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamya, punar api sādhukārāṇy adaduḥ ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattva utthāyāsanād anena nāmāṣṭaśatena bhagavantam adhīyeṣa ||
vibho mahāvinaya neyārtha vinayāgra namo 'stu te ||
mahāvīra pravīrāgrya śaṁbho śaure namo 'stu te ||
sarvātmaka mune śuddha dharmarāja namo 'stu te ||
nāmāṣṭaśatakaṁ caitad yaḥ kaścic chṛṇuyāt sakṛt |
paṭhed vā bhāvayed vāpi sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt ||
atha bhagavān vairocanaḥ sarvatathāgatādhipateḥ pratijñāvacanam upaśrutya sarvatathāgatān āhūyaivam āha ||
pratipadyata, bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, samājaṁ punar āgantum
atha sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āgamyemāṁ gāthām abhāṣanta ||:
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṁ purataḥ spharya yāvat sarva[paramāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavāñ chākyamuni tathāgato dharmacakraṁ pravartayām āsa ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ punar apīmāṁ gāthām abhāṣat |
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavān vajradhātus tathāgato vajradhātvādīni sarvavajracakrāṇi pravartayām āsa ||
atha trilokavijayo mahābodhisattvas tasmin samaye imāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavāṁs trilokavijayas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatakrodhacakraṁ pravartayām āsa ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre tathaiva sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāvat sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu bhagavān dharmarājas tathāgataḥ padmacakraṁ pravartayām āsa ||

athāsmin bāṣitamātre ye sarvabuddhakṣetreṣv antarasthāḥ sarvasattvāḥ sūkṣmā vā sthūlā vā, te sarve tathāgataṁ sumerugirimūrdhni vajramaṇiratnaśikharakūṭāgāre sarvatathāgatāsananiṣaṇṇaṁ vajradhātvādīni cakrāṇi pravartayantam sarvato drākṣur iti ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas tasyāṁ velāyām imāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||
punar api bhagavān sarvatathāgathān āhūyaivam āha ||
pratipadyata bhagavantas tathāgatāḥ, punaḥ samājam āpattum
atha bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ punaḥ samājam āga[mya bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭā iti ||
atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajram ātmānam avabudhya, vajrapāṇim evam āha ||
kulaputra tvam api mama hṛdaye sarvatathāgatasarvavajrakulasarvamaṇḍalasarvatathāgatahṛdayeṣu samavapraveśasva
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatānujñāta imāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||
athāsmin bhāṣitamātre yāvantas tathāgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti |
te tathāgatā ekaikaśo 'pi sarvalokadhātuparamaṇurajaḥsamāḥ spharaṇakāyāḥ bhagavato vairocanasya hṛdaye praviṣṭāḥ ||

atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgatasya ca bhagavataś ca vairocanasya sarvakāyeṣu sarvavākpravartanasthāneṣu sarvacittasaṁtatipravāheṣu sarvavajranayeṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu sarvasthāneṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvaromakūpeṣu sarvaparamāṇurajomaṇḍaleṣu ca hṛdayeṣu ca praviṣṭvā sthita iti ||

atha bhagavān acirābhisaṁbuddhaḥ sarvatathāgatakāyavākcittavajraḥ sarvatathāgatakāyam ātmānam avabudhya, tasmāt sumerugirimūrdhnād yena bodhimaṇḍalaṁ tenopetya, bhagavato bodhivṛkṣasyādhastāt lokānuvartanatayā punas tṛṇāni gṛhyedam udānam udānayām āsa ||
yad vineyavaśād dhīrās tīrthyadṛṣṭyā sthihanti hi ||
atha kāmāvacarā devā bhagavantas tattvam ajānanto 'brūvan |
kiṁ bho śaraṇaivaṁ tīvrāṇy evaṁ kaṭukāni bodhyarthaṁ duḥkhāny utsahasi ||
atha bhagavāṁs tāni tṛṇāny āstīryopaviṣṭvā tān devān evam āha |
atha kāmāvacarā devā bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ajānanto, yena śakro devānām indras tenopajagmuḥ |
upetya śakraṁ devānām indram idaṁ vṛttāntam ārocayām āsuḥ
atha śakrodevānām indraḥ sarvakāmavacaradevasaṁghaparivāro rūpāvacarādhipatiṁ mahābrahmaṇam idam eva vṛttāntam ārocayām āsa ||
atha mahābrahmā sarvakāmāvacararūpāvacaradevasahitas trilokādhipatim īśvaraṁ taṁ vṛttāntam ārocayām āsa ||
tato maheśvaras trilokādhipatir nārāyaṇādīn sarvadevādhipatīn evam āha |
pratipadyata mārṣās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṁ buddho lokānuvartanaṁ kṛtvā punar anuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhiṁ darśayiṣyati ||
mā marṣā evaṁ vidyur “na tathāgato mānuṣo bhavati” |
evā eva tathāgatāḥ bhaviṣyanti, devasaṁpattaye ghaṭayeyuḥ |
tat sādhu pratipadyata tatra pūjanāya gantum |
atha maheśvarādisarvadevādhipatayo yena bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bhagavān bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇas tenopajagmuḥ |
upetya ca bhagavātaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam evam ūcuḥ |
pratipadyasva, bhagavann asmākam anukampām upādāyāsmāt tṛṣṇasaṁstarād utthāya divyeṣv āsaneṣu niṣadyānuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhim abhisaṁboddhum
na vayaṁ bhagavan samarthā bodhiṁ dātum |
yadi vayaṁ samarthā bhavemas tadātmanaivābhisaṁbodhim abhisaṁbudhyemahi
atha bhagavān idam evārtham uddīpayan bhūyasyā mātrayemāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||
na sā rūpī na cārūpī na satyam na mṛṣā śuci |
buddhabodhir idaṁ jñānam avabudhya jino bhavet ||

div.ab: iti

lg.l: atha te devādhipatayo muhūrtaṁ tūṣṇīṁ bhāvena tasthuḥ ||
atha bhagavāṁs tatas tṛṇāsanād utthāya tān devān evam āha |
atha bhagavāṁs tasminn evāsane niṣadyemāṁ gāthām abhāṣat ||
vajraṁ sattve dṛḍhīkṛtvā buddham ātmā tu bhāvaya ||

atha bhagavān rātrau prabhātāyāṁ lokānuvartanatayā mārāṁ jitvānuttarāṁ samyaksaṁbodhim abhisaṁbudhyaśeṣānavaśeṣasarvasattvadhātuhitopakāraṁ svahṛdayāvasthitam āryavajrapāṇim anena nāmāṣṭaśatenābhiṣṭauti ||
vandyo mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca satkartavyas tathāgataiḥ |
tvām āsādya jināḥ sarve buddhabodhisattvāś ca sauriṇaḥ |
namas te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya te namaḥ |
namas te vajradharmāya namas te vajrakarmaṇe ||
tvām abhiṣṭutya nāmāryaiḥ praṇamya ca subhāvataḥ |
yat puṇyaṁ tena sarvo hi buddhabodhim avāpnuyāt ||
sakṛd vāraṁ subhaktiś ca sarvabuddhatvam āpnuyāt ||
atha vajrapāṇir mahābodhisattvas taiḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sahaikakaṇṭhena sādhukārāṇy anuprādāyi ||
sādhu te vajrasattvāya vajraratnāya sādhu te |
vajradharmāya te sādhu sādhu te vajrakarmaṇe ||

div.ab: iti.

lg.l: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ sahāryabodhisattvaiḥ svahṛdayāvasthitair bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti ||
